video.title: El señor de los Cielos
video.synopsis: Only Aurelio Casillas can fill Pablo Escobar's shoes and become Mexico's biggest drug trafficker of the '90s.

episodes.synopsis: Detective Mejía organizes the manhunt for Aurelio as the firefights rage on. Although he's a womanizer, Aurelio shows that he loves his family.
episodes.title: Arranca la balacera

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio is relieved to find out his daughter is fine, although he was injured. Aurelio and Mechacorta manage to escape in one of the trucks.
episodes.title: Aurelio traiciona a Pablo

episodes.synopsis: Marco tells Aurelio he'll pay for all he's done. Guadalupe tells Mónica that Aurelio has been arrested.
episodes.title: Cayó el narco

episodes.synopsis: Some of Aurelio's inmates decide to kill him. Ximena and her children are traveling by car, but someone is plotting to cut their trip short.
episodes.title: ¡Se salvó!

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio receives a call from Ximena, who tells him both she and the kids are OK. Don Cleto tells Alba that Ximena and the kids survived the explosion.
episodes.title: ¡Cásate conmigo!

episodes.synopsis: Ximena and Aurelio's wedding day has arrived. The Norteño realizes that an attack has been planned against Ximena and the Jaibo is being hunted.
episodes.title: La boda del año

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio tells Isidro he knows he was the one who had the bomb planted in the car Ximena and the kids were traveling in.
episodes.title: Murió envenenado

episodes.synopsis: Guadalupe doesn't believe the death of his brother Isidro was caused by a heart attack; he's sure Aurelio has something to do with it.
episodes.title: Soy el rey

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio tells the Corporal he's going with them to Colombia; Guadalupe and Mónica show up as well. Jiménez wants Mejía and his girlfriend watched.
episodes.title: Pacto de narcos

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio is furiuos when Guadalupe refuses to let him help her rescue Mónica. The Corporal tells Aurelio that things are getting out of hand.
episodes.title: Rescate suicida

episodes.synopsis: Jairo's planning to eliminate the Corporal, but Aurelio won't have it. Eugenia tells Linares she's worried about the article he wrote in the paper.
episodes.title: ¡Qué tentación!

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio buys a 727 jet to transport drugs. Aurelio sends the drugs by plane, and he and his men travel on a separate plane just in case.
episodes.title: Estoy embarazada

episodes.synopsis: Chacorta arrives at the recording studio to see how Matilde's coming along with the disco song. The Corporal asks Aurelio who Letrudo is.
episodes.title: ¡La pagarás!

episodes.synopsis: Doris tells Ema they tried to kidnap her, but thank God, she managed to escape. Tijera tells Guadalupe that Aurelio managed to get the drugs.
episodes.title: Los secuestraron

episodes.synopsis: Oscar forces Dobladillo to talk with Canica on the phone. Canica tells him where Commander Macario, the one holding Aurelio, can be found.
episodes.title: ¡Lo liberaron!

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio introduces his new pilot to Mónica, but she doesn't give the new hire a warm welcome. Ximena catches Heriberto smoking marijuana with Matilde.
episodes.title: Celos que matan

episodes.synopsis: The Turk tells Coronel Jiménez that a new shipment is arriving from Colombia and gives him a photo of Pombo, the man they're after.
episodes.title: ¡No te mueras!

episodes.synopsis: Roxana asks Guadalupe to help her out with some money, but he takes advantage of her by force. Coronel Jiménez tells Doris about his promotion.
episodes.title: Aprovéchate de mí

episodes.synopsis: Chacorta tests the waters for selling drugs in new territory. Chacorta talks with Aurelio and tells him the drug shop business is doing very well.
episodes.title: Un cuadro de millones

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio asks Irina to get in touch with the president. She says she can't, but she can contact his cousin. Chacorta's drug store project continues.
episodes.title: Las narcotiendas

episodes.synopsis: Marco tells Jiménez they have to dismantle the Casillas' distribution network in the districts. The Villalobos request an appointment with Aurelio.
episodes.title: La primera sospecha

episodes.synopsis: Mónica is furious when Aurelio doesn't answer his cell phone. Ponte tells Marco Mejía his men are ready to move out.
episodes.title: La foto de Casillas

episodes.synopsis: Jiménez gives the green light to go after Aurelio Casillas, and Marco Mejía starts an operation to dismantle the Casillases' organization.
episodes.title: En los titulares

episodes.synopsis: The Villalobos find out about what's going on with Aurelio Casillas and they decide to take advantage of the situation to cut him out of the business.
episodes.title: Fuera del negocio

episodes.synopsis: Marco Mejía tries to intercept the Casillases' communications. Ramiro tells Aurelio that the journalist working against him is Eugenia, Marco's wife.
episodes.title: Aquí tiene mi renuncia

episodes.synopsis: Matilde sleeps with Heriberto. Chacorta tries to shoot Eugenia. Marco Mejía and Chacorta get in a firefight.
episodes.title: Tentaciones peligrosas

episodes.synopsis: Doña Alba hands over the documents for a new lot for the school so she can get Rutila back and continue with her studies.
episodes.title: Todo por venganza

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio and Mónica reunite. After Benítez's nomination, Doris proposes to Jiménez that they organize a dinner party for top government officials.
episodes.title: Secuestrada

episodes.synopsis: Juan Villalobos tells Ximena they know about Heriberto and Matilde's affair. Sonia overhears Ramiro's conversation with Irina and decides to step in.
episodes.title: Quién es el infiltrado

episodes.synopsis: The Corporal visits Aurelio to tell him someone's trying to cut him out of the business. He asks him to help him rescue Ximena.
episodes.title: Cuídate la espalda

episodes.synopsis: Sonia threatens Ramiro saying she's going to tell everything during the meeting, but Ramiro tells her she'll regret it if she does.
episodes.title: Principales sospechosos

episodes.synopsis: The president asks Marco Mejía to give him a list of the names of all the government officials suspected of being involved in the drug trade.
episodes.title: El expediente

episodes.synopsis: Sonia asks a priest for an appointment with the cardinal to confess something very terrible. Matilde confronts Chacorta for having a baby with Aída.
episodes.title: La amante de tu hijo

episodes.synopsis: The Corporal and Tijeras take over Oscar Cadena's organization and hand him over to the police. Aurelio visits the Villalobos and finds a surprise.
episodes.title: Me las pagarás

episodes.synopsis: Sonia meets with the cardinal to show him the evidence of Ramiro's involvement in drug trafficking. Leonor and Marco Mejía spend the night together.
episodes.title: La libreta

episodes.synopsis: Marco Mejía convinces Jiménez he's not willing to work with Leonor anymore. Leonor gets into the recording studio pretending to be a fan of Alejo.
episodes.title: Choque con criminales

episodes.synopsis: Marco returns to his house to gather his things and tries to talk with Eugenia, but she refuses to listen to him and throws him out.
episodes.title: Fuera del camino

episodes.synopsis: The Turk convinces the Topo Galván to help Aurelio convince the Villalobos. Linares is released from the hospital.
episodes.title: Nexos con el narcotráfico

episodes.synopsis: Matilde tells Alba she'll give her a good sum of money and the kid, since he's Chacorta's son. Aurelio tells Guadalupe to get rid of the cardinal.
episodes.title: Sumando muertes

episodes.synopsis: Alfonso authorizes the publication of Eugenia's article on the cardinal's death with no changes.
episodes.title: Algo está cambiando

episodes.synopsis: Marco Mejía visits Ramiro in his office and asks about Sonia. Ramiro says she's in London with her daughter. Aurelio meets Leonor and flirts with her.
episodes.title: Nuevo romance

episodes.synopsis: Ximena asks Aurelio if he had something to do with the death of the cardinal. Aurelio promises to change.
episodes.title: Déjame escapar

episodes.synopsis: Mónica feels bad about hitting Triste and apologizes, and says Aurelio won't see her stupid face around anymore. Ximena visits Cleto.
episodes.title: No me veas la cara

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio tells the Corporal and Tijeras that he's leaving them the Robles' and the Villalobos' territory. Cleto is worried about the shipment.
episodes.title: Esta vida no es para mí

episodes.synopsis: Leonor drugs Alejandro so he won't make a move on her. Ximena is thinking of leaving Aurelio. Aurelio wakes up to an empty bed.
episodes.title: Confesión de amor

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio asks his men to put everything on hold and start looking for Ximena. The Topo Galván proposes a partnership with Oscar Cadena.
episodes.title: En busca de Ximena

episodes.synopsis: Benítez thanks General Jiménez for not arresting Don Cleto, and he says the drug cartels were hit hard.
episodes.title: El regreso

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio hits Ximena and tells her she's not allowed to leave the house without his permission. Leonor is very worried that Aurelio found her gun.
episodes.title: Golpe al alma

episodes.synopsis: Cabo is depressed after what happened with Mónica. Víctor takes Matilde by force. El Pollo tells El Topo Galván Don Cleto had a heart attack.
episodes.title: Tiempos de infarto

episodes.synopsis: Ponte and Orejas find out Letrudo is General Jiménez himself. Leonor tells Marco Mejía that General Jiménez was at the Casillas ranch.
episodes.title: Provocadora

episodes.synopsis: The Turk tells Aurelio he has the hospital blueprints, but it doesn't look like they'll be able to free Don Cleto without losing some men.
episodes.title: Contrarreloj

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio confronts Don Cleto for betraying him by trying to team up with the Topo Galván. Don Cleto denies it. Doris tells Jiménez to get rid of Marco.
episodes.title: La traición

episodes.synopsis: Marco Mejía shows the lawyer Benítez the recording of General Jiménez doing business with Aurelio Casillas.
episodes.title: Encrucijada

episodes.synopsis: Marco Mejía tells Eugenia and Alfonso he's confirmed that Jiménez Arroyo is the traffickers' government contact. Leonor visits Ponte at the clinic.
episodes.title: Los dueños del mundo

episodes.synopsis: The Topo Galván tells the Pollo that he's going to ally with Mónica, because he's going to need her Colombian contacts. The Turk and Randy talk.
episodes.title: Tras los pasos de Casillas

episodes.synopsis: General Jiménez tells Marco he's willing to talk but only with the judge assigned to him, on the condition that Doris is granted immunity.
episodes.title: La boca bien cerrada

episodes.synopsis: Alba warns Heriberto not to follow in Aurelio's footsteps, because it's going to end badly. Aurelio has a confession he's forced to make to Mónica.
episodes.title: Muerta de los celos

episodes.synopsis: Eugenia asks Vanesa about Alejandro Negrete she tells her she was with him at the Casillas ranch during a curfew.
episodes.title: La amenaza

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio kidnaps eugenia and takes her to a bodega. Heriberto is very upset about the article that came out in the paper on Alejandro's disappearance.
episodes.title: No diga nada

episodes.synopsis: Alfonso goes looking for Eugenia, and can't believe what he finds. The Turk tells Ximena Heriberto had nothing to do with Alejandro's disappearance.
episodes.title: Prisionera en mi casa

episodes.synopsis: Chacorta warns the Turk to be careful around Aurelio, because he's a cold-blooded killer who is capable of anything.
episodes.title: La culpa es de ella

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio escapes from the security building. Ochoa finds a bodega filled with cocaine. Ponte finds a computer. Leonor finds a room full of documents.
episodes.title: La fuga

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio arrives at the hotel where Mónica is staying. Turco asks Chacorta to get rid of Miss Sinaloa's body, because Marco Mejía is on his way.
episodes.title: Camino a la verdad

episodes.synopsis: Marco Mejía hands over the results of Cleto Letrán's autopsy to Ximena and says he's convinced Aurelio Casillas was the murderer.
episodes.title: El nombre del padre

episodes.synopsis: Ximena shows up in the Turk's room and tells him she wants to be with him. Parra tries to kill Leonor.
episodes.title: Finalmente juntos

episodes.synopsis: The Corporal kills Tijeras's cousin J.J. in front of Aurelio Casillas. Leonor tells Ponte they should investigate El Turco, Aurelio's right-hand man.
episodes.title: Secuestrados

episodes.synopsis: Matilde and Heriberto are kidnapped. Aurelio finds out the Corporal wanted to get rid of him, so he invites him to San Luis Potosí to kill Colmenares.
episodes.title: Complot

episodes.synopsis: The Turk shows up just in time to save the Corporal. He gives Aurelio Tijeras's DNA results and tells him the Corporal is loyal to him.
episodes.title: Los platos rotos

episodes.synopsis: Marco Mejía asks Benítez not to tell the president about his suspicions that someone in the government is involved in the Colmenares assassination.
episodes.title: Sin mí te mueres

episodes.synopsis: Chacorta takes Matilde to the hospital. Heriberto is upset. President Benítez tells Marco Mejía he has his back and he won't negotiate with criminals.
episodes.title: Furioso y en la mira

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio invites Ximena over for dinner. The Corporal and his men arrive at the restaurant where Aurelio is eating and a firefight breaks out.
episodes.title: Dura balacera

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio tries to take Ximena out of the country by force, but she manages to disarm one of Aurelio's men, leading to a standoff.
episodes.title: Volver a empezar

episodes.synopsis: The Corporal tells Irina he's looking for Aurelio Casillas. Aurelio returns to Mexico. He tells Irina he's thinking of getting back in the business.
episodes.title: Una nueva cara

episodes.synopsis: Rutila is forced to lie to Ximena for fear of the Turk, and says she misses her father. Aurelio checks into the hospital for plastic surgery.
episodes.title: Vivo o muerto

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio fakes his own death, the Corporal is arrested, Scissors abducts Doña Alba, and Chacorta and his men attack Marco Mejía.
episodes.title: Sorpresa y venganza

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio tries to discover where the Turk hid the stolen money, and Leonor and Ponte barely escape a bombing at the hospital.
episodes.title: Rescate y emboscada

episodes.synopsis: After a shootout, Aurelio and his men rescue Alba from the warehouse. Meanwhile, Chema delves into the truth behind Aurelio's death.
episodes.title: Escape

episodes.synopsis: Leonor leads the police to the Turk's house, but he's long gone. Meanwhile, Mónica kills the Cook and Pinto, and Chema tracks down Aurelio's doctors.
episodes.title: Nuevos horizontes

episodes.synopsis: Mónica returns home to shocking news, Aurelio scours Los Angeles for the Turk and his family, and Chacorta takes three hostages.
episodes.title: Trampa

episodes.synopsis: Ximena confesses that she doesn't love the Turk. After killing Ronnie, Aurelio finds Ximena, who tells him that she will never return to him.
episodes.title: Reencuentro

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio and Ximena reunite with their children, Doña Alba tries to buy absolution, and the Turk uses Irina to try to negotiate with Aurelio.
episodes.title: Detención

episodes.synopsis: Matilde wants to team up with Chema behind Chacorta's back, Leo is attacked, and Lay and Aurelio spend a passionate and revealing night together.
episodes.title: Propuestas

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio threatens Mónica, who gets the upper hand in a showdown. Later, Leonor's men exchange gunfire with Chacorta and Heriberto.
episodes.title: Perdóname mi amor

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio pledges his life to Mónica, and Ximena reconnects with her son Heriberto, who wants her help getting out of the drug business.
episodes.title: Estrategia

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio tracks down and tortures the Turk, but gets no answers. Meanwhile, Miravelle vows to help Leonor get out of jail.
episodes.title: Escondite

episodes.synopsis: Mónica suggests that Aurelio deal his own merchandise and part ways with the Colombians. Alba steps in when the idea divides Aurelio and Chacorta.
episodes.title: Entrega especial

episodes.synopsis: Two attacks are planned at the summit between the Mexican president and the U.S. drug czar, and Leonor is accused of injuring a fellow inmate.
episodes.title: Bombas

episodes.synopsis: The Corporal seeks Mónica Robles's help in traveling to Colombia, and Aurelio is enraged to learn that Chema is buying all the Colombian merchandise.
episodes.title: Celos

episodes.synopsis: Heriberto asks Ignacio for help fleeing the country, Mónica shoots Irina, and Chema wants Aurelio's DNA to compare against the body.
episodes.title: Muerte inocente

episodes.synopsis: Elsa chooses a run for office over the offer of a presidential cabinet position, Chema locks Matilde in the house, and Aurelio rouses Lay's suspicions.
episodes.title: Confesiones

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio tries to get Heriberto to stay. Meanwhile, Pedro asks for Max's support and Elsa seeks Chema's help as they campaign for governor of Jalisco.
episodes.title: La condena

episodes.synopsis: Chema asks Matilde to take him on as a partner in her new business, and Aurelio, who's been kicked out of the house, looks for Heriberto.
episodes.title: Rehén

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio cuts off shipments to Chacorta, Matilde blackmails Jacobo, and Elsa is angered by her slip in the polls.
episodes.title: Amenaza

episodes.synopsis: Santiago offers to hire Heriberto, Mónica tells Aurelio that she wants a child with him, and Leonor and a fellow inmate plan an escape from prison.
episodes.title: Libertad

episodes.synopsis: General Montoya discovers Francisco's true identity, Juan Andrés is assaulted during dinner, and Tatiana catches Gildardo as he spies for Tostado.
episodes.title: Al descubierto

episodes.synopsis: Chema tracks the identity of the Mexican who's muscling in on his business, and Leonor seeks Col. Ramos's help in freeing Ponte from jail.
episodes.title: Determinación

episodes.synopsis: Ignacio offers to marry Leonor so she's not deported. Meanwhile, Aurelio threatens Gildardo with dismemberment if he doesn't tell the truth.
episodes.title: Decisiones

episodes.synopsis: Chacorta offers Pepe Johnson a business proposal, Mónica tells Aurelio that she's pregnant, and Aurelio wants to build a lab in Venezuelan territory.
episodes.title: El fruto del amor

episodes.synopsis: Chema seeks Elsa's help in getting Scissors out of jail, and Heriberto makes a life-changing decision to leave the business.
episodes.title: Heriberto

episodes.synopsis: Santiago steps in between Ernesto and Ximena, Lay confesses her enduring love for Aurelio, and Leonor agrees to marry Ignacio to avoid deportation.
episodes.title: El amor de Lai

episodes.synopsis: Mónica is ready to kill Lay, who reveals that Scissors orchestrated the attack. Meanwhile, Ximena protects Heriberto when Chacorta comes to the house.
episodes.title: Unión

episodes.synopsis: After warning Ximena that the shelter project is getting unwanted attention, Santiago proposes to her. Aurelia, Mónica and Lay arrive in Mexico.
episodes.title: Traición

episodes.synopsis: Heriberto chooses to stay, Leonor asks Victoria to help him find Ximena, and Chema orders Matilde to dig up information on Chacorta.
episodes.title: Malos entendidos

episodes.synopsis: Alba confronts Matilde about her alcoholism, Mónica reveals her pregnancy to Chema so he'll stop beating her, and Aurelio travels to Guatemala.
episodes.title: Nuevas oportunidades

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio and Chacorta plot to rescue Mónica and eliminate Chema, Leonor starts following Ximena, and Aurelio reports Chema to Interpol.
episodes.title: Denuncia

episodes.synopsis: After a shootout with Interpol agents, Chema is busted by the DEA. Meanwhile, Santiago suggests that Heriberto turn himself in to protect Ximena.
episodes.title: Intento de soborno

episodes.synopsis: Lay seeks Iñaqui's partnership in a trafficking operation, Leonor demands that Ximena turn over Aurelio, and Pepe threatens Irma.
episodes.title: La vieja casa

episodes.synopsis: Chema tells Andrews to watch Elsa, Leonor and Gómez follow Ximena, and Heriberto tells Aurelio that he wants to settle down and stop hiding.
episodes.title: Miedo

episodes.synopsis: After Heriberto tells Aurelio  he wants to live a quiet life, they get into a gunfight with Leonor at the Casillas Ranch. Elsa visits Chema in jail.
episodes.title: Huida

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio finally sees Heriberto off to Spain. Meanwhile, Tostado shoots Victor in the legs, causing a ripple effect on both sides of the war.
episodes.title: Impedimento

episodes.synopsis: Victor blames Chacorta when she visits the hospital, Leonor learns that Cecilia only has a few days to live, and Mónica loses her baby.
episodes.title: Perdida

episodes.synopsis: Ximena and Santiago prevent Ramos from interrogating Victor; Aurelio suggests to Chacorta that they set up business in Spain to keep an eye on Chema.
episodes.title: Venganza

episodes.synopsis: Rutila gives Ernesto money to buy a house, Irma tells Chacorta that Pepe's blackmailing her, and Father Lázaro finds drugs on Ernesto.
episodes.title: Secuestro

episodes.synopsis: Chacorta hires Ernesto, Aurelio tangles with Pantaleón and Tostado, and Ignacio pleads with Leonor to flee the country.
episodes.title: Emboscada

episodes.synopsis: Elsa is forced to make allowances in order to help Chema escape from prison, and Lilo goes undercover as a reporter and visits Danilo's ranch.
episodes.title: Secreto

episodes.synopsis: Victor warns Rutila about spending time with Ernesto, Lilo quizzes Danilo about his personal life, and Navárez and Leonor visit Chema in jail.
episodes.title: Reclamo

episodes.synopsis: Matilde lashes out against some hecklers, Leonor searches Matilde's business then has her arrested, and Chema asks Whiskers to kill Navárez.
episodes.title: Danilo Ferro

episodes.synopsis: Under orders from Chema, El Bigotes kills Navares but is wounded in the attempt. Later, Ignacio asks Elsa at a press conference if she was involved.
episodes.title: Asesino

episodes.synopsis: A dying Navárez tells Victoria to flee the country. Ramos is wounded when Bull's men kill Whiskers, who's about to spill his secrets to Leonor.
episodes.title: La Gober

episodes.synopsis: Elsa agrees to marry Max just to advance her political career. Meanwhile, Matilde confesses everything about Aurelio and the family to Father Lázaro.
episodes.title: Confesión

episodes.synopsis: Mónica sets up a false company as a front for Victoria's campaign, and Aurelio makes the first donation in Danilo's name for 5 million pesos.
episodes.title: Seducción

episodes.synopsis: Bull and Scissors pose as meat delivery men to break Chema out of jail, and Ernesto grills Matilde about her conversation with Father Lázaro.
episodes.title: Fuga

episodes.synopsis: Irma delivers the first cut of the film, Chema orchestrates a jailbreak and Chacorta sends Manotas to question Father Lazaro.
episodes.title: Susto

episodes.synopsis: Manotas moves against Father Lázaro, infuriating Aurelio. After Aurelio convinces Victoria of his honesty, she invites him to her campaign office.
episodes.title: Ave María Purísima

episodes.synopsis: Iñaqui insists that Lay take over before Matilde's anger gets out of control. Meanwhile, Leonor doesn't believe Father Lázaro killed himself.
episodes.title: Tortura

episodes.synopsis: Mónica learns that she's pregnant, Aurelio seduces Victoria, and Chema asks Matilde to help him get answers about Oscar Cadena's death.
episodes.title: Atracción

episodes.synopsis: Mónica catches Aurelio in bed with Victoria when she shows up unannounced to tell him she's pregnant; Chacorta thinks Ernesto ratted him out.
episodes.title: Mónica

episodes.synopsis: Max doesn't agree with Elsa's plans to close Villa Catalina to boost her image, and Ximena and Santiago try to persuade Rutila to study abroad.
episodes.title: Encuestas

episodes.synopsis: Victor overhears Manotas plotting to kill Ernesto, Max accelerates Ximena's trial to help Elsa's campaign, and Iñaqui starts working with Aurelio.
episodes.title: Pacto

episodes.synopsis: Rutila seeks Aurelio's protection for Ernesto, leading to a confrontation between the two men. Matilde and Bull's plan to abduct Carlitos hits a snag.
episodes.title: Victima

episodes.synopsis: Mónica tries to find out Victoria's feelings for Aurelio, and Leonor uncovers Max's trial strategy as Ximena is found guilty.
episodes.title: Condena

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio learns where Chema's men are hiding out, Heriberto dodges Leonor at the hospital while visiting Alba, and Chema prepares for war.
episodes.title: Traicionado

episodes.synopsis: Matilde makes the mistake of trying to reconcile with Chacorta. Later, Aurelio and Chacorta begin plotting to murder Chema.
episodes.title: Matilde

episodes.synopsis: A fellow inmate attacks Ximena, Aurelio agrees to meet with Santiago, and Ernesto accidentally admits to killing Matilde.
episodes.title: Enfrentamiento

episodes.synopsis: Leonor and Ramos are forced to let Heriberto and Manotas go after a standoff at the hospital. Meanwhile, Ernesto kills Chente to retain Chema's trust.
episodes.title: Rodeados

episodes.synopsis: Lay tells Chema that Matilde is dead, Elsa rejects a visit from Max, and Ignacio poses as a doctor to gather intelligence on Heriberto.
episodes.title: Eliminado

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of Heriberto's death, Aurelio launches a war, Lay confronts Chema, and Chacorta tries to find a way to break the news to Alba.
episodes.title: Guerra

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio sends Chacorta to exact revenge against Leonor and Ignacio for Heriberto's death. At Heriberto's funeral, Ximena demands answers from Aurelio.
episodes.title: Ataque

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio wants Ximena to help him avenge Heriberto's murder. Later, Chacorta and Aurelio seek the truth behind Manotas's death.
episodes.title: Manotas

episodes.synopsis: Ana Sofía feeds Ignacio info on a new drug trafficker, Aurelio prevents an escape attempt by Danilo, and Chema poisons Elsa's dinner.
episodes.title: Informante

episodes.synopsis: Ernesto admits to Victor that he sent Isabel away, then takes the opportunity to flee Ciudad Juárez with Ximena.
episodes.title: Búsqueda

episodes.synopsis: Chacorta admits to Irma that he killed Matilde. Meanwhile, Rutila meets Ernesto's new boss, who turns out to be Chema.
episodes.title: Patrón

episodes.synopsis: Chema sends Ernesto to kill Lucila after she tells Ignacio and Victoria that he abducted Elsa. Meanwhile, Aurelio decides to eliminate Ximena.
episodes.title: Rutila

episodes.synopsis: Victoria investigates Elsa's disappearance, one of Ernesto's thugs betrays him, and Aurelio tries to see if Chema is holding Rutila.
episodes.title: Desaparición

episodes.synopsis: Victoria blames General Garnica for Lucila's murder, and Lay confirms to Victor that Chema has taken Rutila hostage.
episodes.title: Manipulación

episodes.synopsis: Fearing for Victoria, Aurelio tells her to transfer Ernesto. Meanwhile, Alba tells Ximena to leave with Luzma and Santiago.
episodes.title: Inseguridad

episodes.synopsis: Alba recommends that Victor leave the country. Danilo takes Mónica hostage, and she reveals that she's pregnant before getting the upper hand.
episodes.title: Protección

episodes.synopsis: When Aurelio threatens Chema over Rutila, the two meet to negotiate a deal. Meanwhile, Andrews obtains blackmail material against Gen. Garnica.
episodes.title: Apoyo

episodes.synopsis: Chema orders Rutila to go to Guadalajara, Leonor discovers Ignacio's stockpile of weapons, and Chacorta's thugs go after Monica.
episodes.title: El Escuadrón de la Muerte

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio negotiates with Chema for Rutila's freedom. Meanwhile, Helga starts a blackmail scheme against General Garnica.
episodes.title: Negociación

episodes.synopsis: Eleanor tells Victoria that Ignacio works for the death squad, and Helga reveals that she has a recording of the general's confession.
episodes.title: Entrega

episodes.synopsis: Helga gives Victoria and Leonor the general's incriminating recording, and Iñaqui finds the general and attacks him before Helga and Lay can stop him.
episodes.title: General Garnica

episodes.synopsis: Lay tells Aurelio that Iñaqui will have to leave the country after his assault on General Garnica. Meanwhile, Chema orders Lay's assassination.
episodes.title: Sicarios

episodes.synopsis: Ximena tells Aurelio that she knows he killed Santiago, and he begs her not to tell his daughters. But Ximena's admission makes her a target.
episodes.title: Ximena

episodes.synopsis: Mónica and Aurelio's tumultuous relationship takes its toll on both of them, much to Mónica's dismay.
episodes.title: Despedida

episodes.synopsis: Victoria "La Gober" is shocked when she learns that Aurelio has deceived her by making her think that he was someone else.
episodes.title: Engaño

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio enlists Chacorta to take down El Chema after learning that his arch-enemy has slept with Rutila, Aurelio's daughter.
episodes.title: Chema Venegas

episodes.synopsis: Passions run high as La Gober tries to entrap Aurelio, who then has a high-voltage confrontation with Ballesteros that may land him behind bars.
episodes.title: Leonor Ballesteros

episodes.synopsis: El Señor de los Cielos is locked up. Rutila almost gives birth. Aurelio discovers who killed Chacorta.
episodes.title: Odio sin fin

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio Casillas meets with his family and meets his son. His mother and daughter reject him. Aurelio and Doña Alba organize an escape.
episodes.title: En familia

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio is forced by Leonor to get on the train in order to escape the military. Rivero faces his own squadron.
episodes.title: La Bestia

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio and Leo resist the siege of the corrupt soldiers and gang members and find safety. El Chema and the Iranian traffic arms.
episodes.title: Asedio burlado

episodes.synopsis: Leonor Ballesteros succumbs again to Aurelio. Rivero realizes that Tim is capable of anything and they both decide to come to the rescue.
episodes.title: Proximidad

episodes.synopsis: Tim tells Leonor that she’s out. El Chema visits Rutila. Aurelio negotiates his freedom with Tim in exchange for Yamir and Chema.
episodes.title: El pacto

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio Casillas confronts Tijeras over the death of Chacorta. Chema orders Superjavi and Eleazar to work together.
episodes.title: El ajuste

episodes.synopsis: Julia can’t believe that Leo slept with Aurelio. Tim and Rivero attack Chema, Marcado, and his men at Casillas’s bunker. The CIA recovers the uranium.
episodes.title: Asalto mortal

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio kills Medardo, and Marcado comes to Chema’s aide. Tijeras takes the opportunity to arm himself and flee. Mónica has relations with Omar.
episodes.title: Escurridizo

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio and Leonor argue, and the agent threatens to kill him. Mónica and Rutila have their own business.
episodes.title: La sentencia

episodes.synopsis: Rivero asks Casillas why Rutila hates him. Aurelio looks for Mónica. El Chema is furious at Tijeras’s betrayal.
episodes.title: Intransigente

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio appears in front of his family. Irma blames him for the death of Chacorta. Rivero hands over Ernesto’s letter to Rutila.
episodes.title: Reclamos

episodes.synopsis: Tim tells Julia that together with Casillas, they will fill Chicago with drugs in order to lower the crime rate. Casillas asks Feyo for money.
episodes.title: Inversiones

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio swears in front of Chacorta’s tomb that he will get revenge and tells Irma that she’s responsible for his brother’s death.
episodes.title: Viuda culpada

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio kills Irma and makes it look like the ones responsible for the murder are the ones after him. Aurelio promises to rescue Víctor.
episodes.title: Todo sale mal

episodes.synopsis: Víctor Jr. sees Isabel die. The doctor recommends to Leo that she seek normal relationships in order to forget Aurelio.
episodes.title: Destrozados

episodes.synopsis: Víctor Jr. agrees to join Aurelio Casillas’s business and becomes the capo’s right-hand man. Mónica asks Chema to stay away.
episodes.title: Nuevo Chacorta

episodes.synopsis: Casillas can’t resist La Condesa’s beauty. El Chema feels as if he’s drowning. Víctor wants revenge against the person responsible for the raid.
episodes.title: El Seductor

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio and Víctor Jr. plot revenge against El Chema. At Isabel’s funeral, Cristina asks Rivero to do an interview. Garnica makes a deal.
episodes.title: Guerra familiar

episodes.synopsis: El Chema Venegas kidnaps his own son. Tim tells Aurelio that he needs money. Chema makes it clear to Rutila that he makes the rules.
episodes.title: Acto atroz

episodes.synopsis: Chema tells Rutila she has to win over the boy. Rivero introduces Leonor to Omar. Tijeras makes a pact with Superjarvi.
episodes.title: Desesperada

episodes.synopsis: Don Feyo decides to help Aurelio Casillas do away with El Chema Venegas. Leo is furious with Julia.
episodes.title: Alianza

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio orders the death of Chema. Mónica finds out about Omar and Leonor. Leo goes on vacation.
episodes.title: Orden mortal

episodes.synopsis: Rutila manages to get Aurelio to cancel the bombing of Chema’s house. Rutila moves in with Chema in order to be closer to her son.
episodes.title: Sacrificio

episodes.synopsis: Marcado offer one million pesos for Chema. Aurelio and Mónica make love, and he tells her that he killed Chacorta’s wife.
episodes.title: Debilidad

episodes.synopsis: Marcado rapes Rutila and kills her family in front of her. Rutila is devastated. Chema tries to attack Pompeyo, but Rutila defends him.
episodes.title: Ultrajada

episodes.synopsis: Rutila tells Chema that Marcado raped her. Chema decides to use Chemita as a safeguard. La Condesa tells Leo the truth about Pilar.
episodes.title: Imperdonable

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio confronts Chema. Casillas asks Venegas to return his grandson. Tim and Rivero find out that Aurelio is alone.
episodes.title: Cara a cara

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio and Tim arrive at an agreement to destroy Jack Meléndez. Casillas remains free. Rivero questions Tim’s methods.
episodes.title: Pacto siniestro

episodes.synopsis: Rutila tells Aurelio that Marcado raped her. He swears that they will pay in blood. Aurelio asks Feyo for help in an attempt to save his grandson.
episodes.title: Padre enfurecido

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio tells his story to Cristina in an exclusive interview. Rivero tells Rutila not to hate him.
episodes.title: Revelaciones

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio asks Rutila to trust in him and goes to battle with Rivero and his troops. Aurelio kills Espanto. Feyo and Chema help Aurelio.
episodes.title: Emboscado

episodes.synopsis: Chema rescues Aurelio against all odds. One of Feyo’s men injures Rivero, and he shoots at Aurelio. Don Feyo is also injured.
episodes.title: Lealtad

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio and Chema come together in order to defeat their common enemies. Chema promises to protect Rutila.
episodes.title: Juntos

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio makes it clear to Tim that he is the boss and that he doesn’t take orders. Garnica asks Ignacio to help him clear his record.
episodes.title: Jefe real

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio makes it clear to Superjavi that he’s no snitch. Leo confesses to Ignacio that she went to bed with Aurelio and that it was the best sex ever.
episodes.title: Soplones

episodes.synopsis: Mónica seduces Tijeras. Casillas’s ex is the head of the Colombian drug traffickers. Rutila tells Rivero that Marcado raped her.
episodes.title: La representante

episodes.synopsis: Mónica interrupts the traffickers’ meeting. Rivero tells Rutila that he loves her. Víctor kills Jack, and Julia is unable to stop him.
episodes.title: Intermediaria

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio suffers a heart attack after feeling frustrated because he isn’t recognized as the leader of the drug traffickers.
episodes.title: En crisis

episodes.synopsis: After suffering a heart attack, Aurelio Casillas summons his family. Tim tells Julia that he knew about the attack on Meléndez.
episodes.title: Apoyo incondicional

episodes.synopsis: Mónica threatens to kill Tijeras, thinking he’s a traitor. Leonor goes to Don Feyo’s ranch only to find the Casillases. Andrews warns Chema.
episodes.title: Traicionada

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio and La Condesa kiss. Leo confronts Julia, and she confesses. Aurelio asks Lilo to arm Tijeras’s competition.
episodes.title: Beso bienvenido

episodes.synopsis: Casillas tells his daughter that he laments the deaths of her mother and brother. Tim informs Rivero that he will go to the DEA.
episodes.title: Arrepentido

episodes.synopsis: Mónica hears that Don Feyo wants to kill Aurelio. Belén swears that she hasn’t been unfaithful.
episodes.title: Celos asesinos

episodes.synopsis: Mónica saves Aurelio’s life and confesses her love in front of Feyo. Mónica and Aurelio make love. Aurelio tells Don Feyo that he’s afraid of dying.
episodes.title: Pacto de amor

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio comes out of the operation on top. Mónica warns Belén to stay away from Aurelio. Robles threatens La Condesa.
episodes.title: Mi hombre

episodes.synopsis: Mónica tells Víctor that she saved her uncle’s life. Tijeras threatens Clara. Belén gives herself to Aurelio, and Mónica finds them in bed.
episodes.title: Irresistible

episodes.synopsis: Chema admits that the only woman he loves is Rutila. Mónica reveals to La Condesa that she knows that she cheated on her husband with Aurelio.
episodes.title: Tu calvario

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio proposes that Mónica return to his side and promises to be faithful. Mónica doesn’t believe him. Morejón is annoyed with Ignacio.
episodes.title: Acercamiento

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio meets with Tim. Clara Patricia’s parents are on death’s door. Leo offers her support to Omar.
episodes.title: Socia de infarto

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio accuses Tim Rowling of betrayal. Elisa tells Leo her father was killed in Michoacán.
episodes.title: Las cuentas

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio, Esperanza, and Gloria have a threesome. Omar asks Mónica to warn Rutila to not mess with Leonor.
episodes.title: Por puro placer

episodes.synopsis: Víctor confronts Carreño. Chacortica kills the General’s man. Leo doesn’t want the paramilitary group to exist. Feyo confesses to La Condesa.
episodes.title: De tal palo...

episodes.synopsis: Rutila calls Rivero to ask why she’s being investigated. Chema proposes marriage to Rutila. Aurelio switches gears to money laundering.
episodes.title: Cambio de rubro

episodes.synopsis: Tijeras attacks Eleazar and Jaramillo and finds out that the army has him in their sights. Feyo beats Justino.
episodes.title: Bajo fuego

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza demands that Aurelio follow through with his agreement. Justino’s body is found. Aurelio asks Mónica to kill Andrews.
episodes.title: El Güero

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio informs Feyo that he knows about his father-in-law. Belén asks Aurelio to take her with him. Tijeras asks for Mónica’s support.
episodes.title: Belén y Aurelio

episodes.synopsis: Mónica speaks with Andrews and asks that they become business partners, and Víctor follows them. Don Feyo blames Aurelio for the attack.
episodes.title: De nuevo

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio and Feyo agree to meet. Luzma is kidnapped. Aurelio threatens Marcado and tells Belén that the Emes killed her father.
episodes.title: Sana y salva

episodes.synopsis: Víctor makes sure Mónica can do the job. Aurelio confronts Rutila for Luzma’s disappearance. Leonor is a suspect in Andrews’s death.
episodes.title: Sospechosa

episodes.synopsis: Leo confronts Rivero. Luzma tells her friends her father is going to rescue them. Feyo confronts Belén about her call to Aurelio.
episodes.title: Mi papá

episodes.synopsis: The kidnappers pressure Luzma to say who her father is. Chema and El Toro find out Julia is Tim’s wife and decide to kill her.
episodes.title: Entre bandidos

episodes.synopsis: Morejón asks Rivero to return to his job. Rutila realizes Luz Marina might be taking the drugs she’s producing. Marcado goes for Aurelio’s daughter.
episodes.title: Acá te espero

episodes.synopsis: Morejón tells Ignacio that the rendition of the Emes will help hide the kidnapping. La Condesa is excited to welcome Aurelio and his daughter again.
episodes.title: A salvo

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio is happy to see Belén taking care of Luzma. Mónica supports Rutila for the closure of the laboratory. Feyo’s daughter knows everything.
episodes.title: Pasión

episodes.synopsis: Chema is against closing the laboratory. The doctor tells Aurelio he’s not in good health. El Toro kills Julia, who dies in Tim’s arms.
episodes.title: En sus brazos

episodes.synopsis: Rutila attempts an escape from Chema. Don Feyo seduces Doña Alba. Luzma realizes Belén loves her father. Mónica knows something’s up with Aurelio.
episodes.title: Intento

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio meets with Tim, and they discuss what the agent wants to do now that his wife’s been killed. Don Feyo’s daughter tells her father everything.
episodes.title: Cornudo

episodes.synopsis: Marcado tells Garnica they’ve kidnapped Miravalle’s assistant. Aurelio spends the night with Esperanza. Aurelio and Feyo’s conflict comes to a head.
episodes.title: Todo estalla

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio confirms to Feyo that he was the one who betrayed him. Feyo slits Belén’s throat and gives Aurelio an hour to take his daughter and skip town.
episodes.title: Degollada

episodes.synopsis: Feyo lets everyone know Belén isn’t coming back. Tim confirms that Marcado’s been detained. Aurelio explains to Víctor how they’ll be doing business.
episodes.title: Despedida

episodes.synopsis: After the trio, Aurelio has a heart attack. Everyone’s worried about the president’s drinking problem. Esperanza offers to help Mónica launder money.
episodes.title: Otro whisky

episodes.synopsis: The chef tells Luzma he recognizes her from somewhere. Rivero has to arrest Leonor. Aurelio and Tim agree on a new fall guy for Andrews’s death.
episodes.title: La tía Mónica

episodes.synopsis: Mónica is surprised by Víctor’s sensitivity. Leonor knows she can’t take going back to prison. Cristina and Mónica fight over Víctor.
episodes.title: Sorprendida

episodes.synopsis: Alba senses something between her grandson and Mónica. Tim chooses an agent to take the fall. Mónica names Omar to take care of her son if she’s gone.
episodes.title: Huir de la furia

episodes.synopsis: Doña Alba thinks she should take Aurelio out. Mónica and Leonor face off in Omar’s building. Aurelio plans to turn in the Venezuelan general.
episodes.title: Dolor

episodes.synopsis: Doña Alba tells her grandson about his aunt Amparo. Aurelio finds Luzma high and drunk. Esperanza feels she’s lost control. Leonor is on the run.
episodes.title: Sin control

episodes.synopsis: Rivero doesn’t believe a single word the DEA agent says about Andrews’ death. Doña Alba hears Aurelio say he’s going to kill Feyo.
episodes.title: La señora

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio asks his mother to just kill him. Tijeras realizes there’s something between Esperanza and Super Javi. Rutila is ready to turn Chema in.
episodes.title: De una vez

episodes.synopsis: Rutila confesses to Rivero that Chema was the one who hit her. Aurelio looks ill during the trip. The first lady finds drugs in her daughter’s room.
episodes.title: Choque de trenes

episodes.synopsis: Rutila tells Rivero Chema’s movements. Feyo tells Aurelio he’s a snitch and they’re done working together. Mónica reveals Aurelio’s secret to Víctor.
episodes.title: Fue su tío

episodes.synopsis: Feyo and Chema partner up against Aurelio. Víctor tells Aurelio he’s with Mónica and he’d better not kill her. Luzma gets more drugs.
episodes.title: A golpes

episodes.synopsis: Along with Esperanza, Aurelio decides to go all in for money laundering, leaving the rest of the business to Víctor. Ramiro is released.
episodes.title: Lavado de dinero

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio finds out Mónica and Omar are cousins, and he’s furious to find out Luzma is missing. Cristina is terrified when the chef arrives with Luzma.
episodes.title: Planes en grande

episodes.synopsis: Omar receives a call from Ramiro. Rutila convinces Chema she wants a future with him. Chema goes to help Feyo, who’s about to commit a massacre.
episodes.title: De la madriguera

episodes.synopsis: Omar is going to be president of Mexico. Chema is captured and Rutila and her son is rescued. Omar realizes his presidential plan includes Casillas.
episodes.title: Comprando

episodes.synopsis: Omar agrees to accept Aurelio, Ramiro and Ernestina’s plan on the condition that they leave Mónica alone. Rutila and Víctor find the stash.
episodes.title: Los 34

episodes.synopsis: Tim captures the Venezuelan general. Aurelio takes Cristina to Esperanza as a gift, then kills her in front of her eyes. Aurelio wants his revenge.
episodes.title: Pago con sangre

episodes.synopsis: Rivero, Chema, Feyo, Rutila and Aurelio are in the middle of a war. Miravalle kills Leonor in an attack organized by Aurelio. Two years pass.
episodes.title: Leonor muere

episodes.synopsis: Mónica finds out she’s pregnant with Víctor’s baby. Víctor meets with the official in Colombia. Chema and Don Feyo wait to attack the whole family.
episodes.title: Bajo ataque

episodes.synopsis: Super Javi manages to save Víctor. Chema and Don Feyo’s partnership ends. Omar says he’s changing his drug policy. Aurelio kills Feyo’s daughter.
episodes.title: Ojo por ojo

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio and Esperanza offer Amparo money for Carlitos’s kidney. Tim asks Aurelio to turn someone in so he can stay in the government’s good graces.
episodes.title: Un riñón

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio and Esperanza bet on who can seduce Amparo first. The official, Eleazar and Feyo, eager to get rid of the Casillases, declare war on Aurelio.
episodes.title: El Oficial

episodes.synopsis: Mónica wants to get Víctor out of the jungle. She deals with Carreño and gets Super Javi’s help. Gustavo wants to kill Chema to win respect in Mexico.
episodes.title: De la selva

episodes.synopsis: The King fires a bazooka at Chema’s house, but he escapes through the tunnels. Ramiro offers to get Aurelio the kidney. Chema manages to escape.
episodes.title: La lista

episodes.synopsis: Ramiro is interested in Amparo. Eleazar escapes from the trap. The Engineer tells Torito that the era of Chema may have come to an end.
episodes.title: La era

episodes.synopsis: Chema makes El Toro confess. Aurelio tells Ramiro that the Colombians are exporting the war to Mexican territory.
episodes.title: De exportación

episodes.synopsis: Garnica proposes to Ignacio that they blame Marcado for Leo’s death. El Toro informs Chema that the Engineer brought down almost all his routes.
episodes.title: Perdido

episodes.synopsis: Omar gives a press conference where he says his government is ending the war against drug trafficking. Chema knows Aurelio is behind it.
episodes.title: El trofeo

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio promises to Chema that Ramiro will do everything he asks and take care of Rutila and her son. Chema tells Torito to leave before the shootout.
episodes.title: La caída

episodes.synopsis: Tim insists to Chema he’s nobody’s servant. Rivero quits his job. Esperanza contacts Aurelio with the Venezuelan partner. García falls in Tim’s arms.
episodes.title: Los hilos

episodes.synopsis: The Engineer wants to take advantage of the president’s weakness. Chema finds out he’s going to be transferred. Armando goes to Aurelio’s house.
episodes.title: Un nuevo negocio

episodes.synopsis: Rivero hears Rutila talk with Chema. Gustavo and Tijeras talk about breaking off from Rivero. Esperanza and Aurelio are back together.
episodes.title: En la mira

episodes.synopsis: Rutila visits Chema in prison. El Toro infiltrates the Casillas organization. Aurelio tells Víctor he has the power in Mexico.
episodes.title: El Diablo soy yo

episodes.synopsis: The thirst for revenge and violence in the drug-trafficking world lead to an attack on Aurelio Casillas’s daughter by Don Feyo and the Colombians.
episodes.title: Rutila sobrevive al atentado

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio meets his son and asks Tata to hide him. Later, he tells Esperanza that he was attacked. Rutila is jealous of Officer García.
episodes.title: Aurelio conoce a su hijo Ismael

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio tells Ismael that he is his father and introduces him to the family. He then discovers that the Colombians attacked Rutila and takes revenge.
episodes.title: Aurelio presenta a su huerco

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio tries to kill Feyo to take revenge on Aguilera for threatening his daughter Rutila. Mónica ticks one off the list: Aurelio is behind bars.
episodes.title: Casillas tras El Feyo

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio Casillas can’t keep his promise to finish off Feyo Aguilera. Luzma gets better after an overdose and receives some advice from Amparo.
episodes.title: El Feyo se escapa

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio Casillas seduces Ismael’s mother to get her to help with the kidney. Amparo tries to protect Tata by convincing her not to flee.
episodes.title: Aurelio seduce a La Tata

episodes.synopsis: Mónica has a big decision to make. Robles doesn’t want to lose Víctor’s son. Rutila meets the President of Mexico.
episodes.title: Mónica en una encrucijada

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio orders Esperanza to kill his worst enemy: Don Feyo. His plan is for her to surprise Feyo and shoot him in the head.
episodes.title: Misión para Esperanza

episodes.synopsis: Mónica Robles has a miscarriage and Aurelio calls Víctor to ask him to be with her. Esperanza tells Ismael not to get involved in the drug business.
episodes.title: Mónica pierde el bebé

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio gets mad at Víctor for leaving Mónica alone and makes it clear to him who’s in charge. Powerful men concoct a plan to arrest Feyo.
episodes.title: Aurelio reprende a Víctor

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio tortures Chatarrero so that he betrays Feyo. Feyo makes contacts from Colombia to push more cocaine into Mexico.
episodes.title: Aurelio tortura al Chatarrero

episodes.synopsis: Ismael’s mother tells Casillas to leave her son alone or he’ll pay. Casillas threatens to kill Chatarrero and asks Feyo for suggestions.
episodes.title: Amenaza de La Tata

episodes.synopsis: Amparo dreams that Aurelio kisses her. Tata doesn’t manage to kill Casillas. Rutila puts the President of Mexico in quite a predicament.
episodes.title: Amparo desea a Aurelio

episodes.synopsis: Víctor and Javier get rid of Eleazar. Aurelio orders Esperanza to seduce the ambassador to control his access to information and his movements.
episodes.title: Víctor elimina a Eleazar

episodes.synopsis: Casillas plans to torture his betrayers. Dr. Monteverde is put with Elisa in the investigation. The double capture tempts the most powerful narco.
episodes.title: Elisa y Monteverde secuestrados

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio wants to apologize to Rutila; he confesses that he is in a lot of pain. He confronts her and promises that they will have a conversation.
episodes.title: Aurelio pide perdón a Rutila

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio steals a kiss from Amparo and she is annoyed by his impudence. Later, Casillas orders Chatarrero to kill Monteverde.
episodes.title: Aurelio besa a Amparo a la fuerza

episodes.synopsis: Casillas and his henchmen mercilessly beat up Marcado for threatening his daughter. Aurelio feels proud to show another victim how his enemies fare.
episodes.title: Casillas golpea a Marcado

episodes.synopsis: Robles is straight with Casillas and says she used to love him but now she is with Víctor. Luzma, terrified about her upcoming surgery, meets Benito.
episodes.title: Amor imposible

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio begs Amparo not to leave him. He later has a tête-à-tête with the President of Mexico and everyone knows who is in charge now.
episodes.title: Casillas vulnerable

episodes.synopsis: Amparo looks for Aurelio and they kiss. Esperanza has a tryst with the ambassador of Venezuela. General Carreño Arias denies belonging to the cartel.
episodes.title: Amparo se confiesa

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio Casillas wins the bet and sleeps with Amparo. Rutila and the President of Mexico grow closer when she is separated from Rodrigo.
episodes.title: Amparo y Aurelio hacen el amor

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio offs Tim, the DEA agent, for disobeying him. He asks Amparo to marry him, but she thinks he’s in love with Mónica.
episodes.title: Tim es eliminado

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio asks his daughter to kill the soldier who raped her, but she refuses. Esperanza tells Aurelio about the ambassador’s plans to fight drugs.
episodes.title: Rutila es vengada

episodes.synopsis: Mónica is angry at Rutila for offending her. Suspicions arise about Tim’s death and possible murder. Rutila and the President of Mexico are a couple.
episodes.title: Mónica abofetea a Rutila

episodes.synopsis: Ismael wants in on the family business. Mónica hints that the DEA agent won’t show up. Aurelio wants to pin Tim’s murder on Feyo.
episodes.title: Nicandro está arrepentido

episodes.synopsis: Javier and Víctor steal product from Tijeras. Chacortica robs the Colombian’s boat. Rutila asks her lover to keep quiet--an affair could ruin her.
episodes.title: El Tijeras se queda sin su merca

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio plans to attack Feyo. Esperanza helps the Colombians with drug trafficking deals. Abel Terán thanks the cartels for helping his son.
episodes.title: El Feyo carga con el muerto

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio warns Esperanza that he won’t forgive her if she betrays him. Toro follows his orders to get information about the engineer’s whereabouts.
episodes.title: Advertencia a Esperanza

episodes.synopsis: Connie asks Casillas a personal favor. Aurelio will pay Niki 3 million for her kidney. Officer García fears for her life.
episodes.title: Riñón millonario

episodes.synopsis: Robles takes the bodyguard’s cell phone and threatens to kill him. Feyo and Gustavo are furious about Víctor’s robbery at sea.
episodes.title: Mónica enfrenta al soplón de Feyo

episodes.synopsis: Casillas’s worst enemy shoots his son so he can’t use his kidney. The narco business floods Colombia and Venezuela with drugs.
episodes.title: Adiós riñón de Niki

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio is furious when he learns that Feyo killed his son and he needs a new kidney. Although Miravalle is the boss, it’s Garnica who is in charge.
episodes.title: Aurelio desespera por un riñón

episodes.synopsis: Mónica saves Luzma. Robles offs Feyo’s bodyguard. Feyo swears he will kill all of Casillas’s sons so Casillas has no chance of survival.
episodes.title: Mónica salva a Luzma

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio Casillas orders Garnica to look for his son Nazareno. Eva Ernestina is about to leak the President’s romance with Rutila to the press.
episodes.title: En busca de Nazareno

episodes.synopsis: Casillas is surprised to hear Connie’s proposal. García is revealed when she learns that her operation with Rowlings will now continue with Garnica.
episodes.title: Connie ama a Aurelio

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio can’t stand Connie’s schemes and wants her out of his way. Esperanza contacts Javier to try to stop them from killing the ambassador.
episodes.title: Connie se vuelve un estorbo

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio wants Víctor’s wife for himself. Dalvio Navarrete and Tata Guerra meet General Carreño and Armando Pérez Ricard on their visit to Mexico.
episodes.title: Aurelio seduce a Mónica

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio orders Rutila to stay away from the President. Rodrigo’s jealousy could ruin his career when he finds out about his girlfriend’s new lover.
episodes.title: Rutila juega con fuego

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio locks up his son Nazareno to get his kidney and asks Amalia to make Nazareno understand that he has little choice in the matter.
episodes.title: Nazareno acorralado

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio suffers when he sees his daughter almost die from an overdose of the very drugs that make him rich. Mónica warns Víctor about the Colombians.
episodes.title: Aurelio rescata a Luzma

episodes.synopsis: Casillas makes his daughter believe he doesn’t love her so that she agrees to receive treatment. Víctor considers hiring gangsters from Mexico.
episodes.title: Casillas aleja a Luzma

episodes.synopsis: Rutila takes the reins during Aurelio’s operation. The press visit the President of Mexico, who refuses to give a statement.
episodes.title: Listo para la cirugía

episodes.synopsis: Casillas’s operation is a success, but Felina plans to kill him. Ismael will go on with his life but Rutila makes sure to thank him first.
episodes.title: Nuevo peligro para Aurelio

episodes.synopsis: Feyo and the Colombians attack Aurelio’s clinic, but Rutila and her men try to protect him. Felina is admitted to the hospital. A sudden death occurs.
episodes.title: Ataque a sangre y fuego

episodes.synopsis: Víctor’s jealousy leads him to doubt Mónica’s love for him. Later, he goes to Switzerland with his gang to expand their distribution network.
episodes.title: Víctor celoso de Aurelio

episodes.synopsis: Casillas thinks that Esperanza wants to cheat on him. Rodrigo convinces the ambassador to tell him what Esperanza knows about the trade and the General.
episodes.title: La cabeza del embajador

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio and Rutila discover that Felina killed Norma. The Casillas family orders that Felina be found and eliminated.
episodes.title: Tras La Felina

episodes.synopsis: Mónica looks for Felina to launder Víctor’s money and does a risky deal with the Colombian. Casillas tries to spread the scandal about the President.
episodes.title: Mónica se alía con La Felina

episodes.synopsis: Casillas is surprised to learn that Tata’s boyfriend is one of his enemies. He promises to include the ambassador in his business to keep him close.
episodes.title: Dalvio desenmascarado

episodes.synopsis: Mónica senses that Felina wants to betray her. Víctor is worried about Mónica’s safety and Javier guarantees that she is in good hands.
episodes.title: Mónica sospecha de La Felina

episodes.synopsis: Casillas fears that his enemy will harm his son and Tata. Feyo and Gustavo protect Felina. Mónica pushes back her meeting with the Colombian.
episodes.title: Ataque en marcha

episodes.synopsis: Ismael’s mother refuses to believe that Dalvio is a narco. The Colombians’ macabre plan is to kidnap Mónica, ask for ransom, and then kill her.
episodes.title: La Tata defiende a su novio

episodes.synopsis: Ismael’s mother tells Dalvio that her son’s father is Aurelio Casillas. Víctor keeps a sharp eye on Felina, Javier and Mónica in a business dinner.
episodes.title: La Tata enfrenta al Ingeniero

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo questions Esperanza’s sexual orientation when she confirms her relationship with the diplomat.
episodes.title: Chacortica se siente traicionado

episodes.synopsis: Mónica calls Aurelio and asks him a special favor before meeting Felina. Casillas warns Ismael that his mother’s lover could be the object of revenge.
episodes.title: Pedido especial de Mónica

episodes.synopsis: Víctor and Mónica face the Colombians. Both gangs prepare for the drug hand-off. Mónica and Felina will negotiate while the men make other plans.
episodes.title: Contra Los Colombianos

episodes.synopsis: The ambassador, Rodrigo and Officer García talk about money laundering. Víctor brags about the booming drug business in Europe.
episodes.title: Aurelio y Víctor pelean por Mónica

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo warns about an even bigger wave of violence looming over Mexico. Arms and drug trafficking are on the Security Council’s agenda.
episodes.title: Amor confesado

episodes.synopsis: Chacortica buys an hacienda to live in with Mónica and their future family. New ways of making money from drugs emerge. Feyo and the engineer argue.
episodes.title: Aurelio muere de celos

episodes.synopsis: Mónica says a painful goodbye to Aurelio and takes their son away. Eva continues her campaign that will spark the scandal.
episodes.title: Dolorosa despedida

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio is sad to see the woman he loves leave with his nephew and tries to find peace. Rodrigo follows Esperanza to make sure she launders the money.
episodes.title: Aurelio despechado

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio threatens Víctor so he follows orders. Chacortica confronts Casillas. The ambassador, tired of illicit business, announces his resignation.
episodes.title: Chacortica planta cara

episodes.synopsis: Ismael will be Aurelio’s right-hand man. The Colombians recruit a gang and start a war in Mexico City. Ambassador Salazar receives a threat.
episodes.title: Ismael, la mano derecha

episodes.synopsis: Feyo and his henchmen kidnap the reporter who blamed them for the death of the President’s father. Casillas and Ismael go to a brothel to celebrate.
episodes.title: La periodista suelta la sopa

episodes.synopsis: Chacortica is anxious to hear Mónica’s answer. The President has dinner with the model chosen by the campaign and gives her an engagement ring.
episodes.title: Pedida matrimonial

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio tells Víctor to control the gangs from El Salvador. Mónica receives a gorgeous gift and proposal from Víctor.
episodes.title: Aliados problemáticos

episodes.synopsis: Casillas orders Omar to attack the Colombians. Now Víctor is the gang leader and Javier makes Aurelio see that they are the best for the drug trade.
episodes.title: Aurelio ordena al presidente

episodes.synopsis: The President asks Aurelio for Eva Ernestina Gallardo’s head. Esperanza launders the narcos’ money by buying enormous properties.
episodes.title: Eva Ernestina sentenciada

episodes.synopsis: Casillas targets the narco for talking to the authorities. Mónica is back at work without giving Víctor any competition and answers his proposal.
episodes.title: Lencho en la mira

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio threatens to kill General Garnica. Lencho’s murder comes to light and the Colombians get a call from his daughter, who is thirsty for revenge.
episodes.title: El turno de Garnica

episodes.synopsis: Casillas takes revenge on General Garnica for humiliating his daughter. Esperanza sees that the affair between the President and the model is a farce.
episodes.title: Humillación cobrada

episodes.synopsis: Emiliana swears to take revenge on Casillas. Rodrigo informs the President of the results of the anti-drug operations.
episodes.title: Juramento de hija

episodes.synopsis: Casillas promises Emiliana that he will find out who was behind her father’s death. Esperanza has a solution to house the former ambassador.
episodes.title: Aurelio conoce a Emiliana

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio loses no time in seducing Emiliana. She wants in on the business and tells him that she has three and a half tons of drugs in her possession.
episodes.title: Nueva conquista

episodes.synopsis: Feyo hits Casillas where it hurts the most. Miravalle admits to killing the President’s wife and makes a fateful decision.
episodes.title: El Feyo pasa a la acción

episodes.synopsis: Feyo wounds Ismael and keeps him locked up with his mother. The Señor de los Cielos plans a vengeful attack.
episodes.title: Fin de un enemigo

episodes.synopsis: Casillas seduces Emiliana and calls for a truce with the Colombians after Aguilera’s death. Rodrigo tries to open Rodrigo’s eyes after his confession.
episodes.title: Casillas seduce a Emiliana

episodes.synopsis: Casillas asks Emiliana to marry him without knowing that she and Felina are plotting their revenge. The model marries the President.
episodes.title: Aurelio cazado

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio saves Mónica and her son from Víctor’s trap. He knows that Chacortica filled Mexico with drugs and handed arms over to the gangs.
episodes.title: Trampa burlada

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio Casillas is willing to destroy his main enemies and starts to hunt for those who betrayed him.
episodes.title: Sed de Venganza

episodes.synopsis: The standoff left “carnage” in front of the building where the President of Mexico was giving his speech. A furious Víctor vows to exact his revenge.
episodes.title: Hay plan B

episodes.synopsis: After the explosion during the parade, they play off the attack as if it were an accident. Víctor is furious and thinks about bombing Los Pinos.
episodes.title: Casillas contra Casillas

episodes.synopsis: Sebastián is arrested and the DEA will use this to find out more about Aurelio Casillas. Ismael wants Casillas and Víctor to make up.
episodes.title: Tras el pez gordo

episodes.synopsis: The men going to rescue Felina start shooting at the truck transporting her and she thinks that Emiliana betrayed her. She manages to get away.
episodes.title: La fuga de Felina

episodes.synopsis: The president finds out that Felina is arrested and threatens to kill Rivero while he’s carrying out his duties if he doesn’t leave Casillas alone.
episodes.title: Nexos con el narcotráfico

episodes.synopsis: Mónica makes a drastic decision that affects her son Isidrito. Casillas continues looking for financial and logistical support to get rid of Víctor.
episodes.title: Mediadora

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio is devastated after finding out the truth about Emiliana. Meanwhile, she has to decide whether or not to face the consequences of her actions.
episodes.title: Corazón partido

episodes.synopsis: Before Lourdes reappears, ready to avenge Don Feyo’s death, Casillas takes forceful actions. They trap Esperanza and make her act against Casillas.
episodes.title: Encuentros decisivos

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza explains the chart on drug trafficking in Colombia, Mexico, and Venezuela. Casillas goes to Colombia to look for Víctor.
episodes.title: Esperanza, la informante

episodes.synopsis: Emiliana, Aurelio’s fiancée, goes from love to hatred when she finds out that Lourdes is dead. Casillas’s hacker can’t transfer money to Major Javi.
episodes.title: Emiliana declara la guerra

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza’s parents are worried about her disappearance and alleged connections to the trafficker. She is overcome with fear.
episodes.title: Desaparecida

episodes.synopsis: Colón gives instructions to protect Esperanza’s life. Javi offers to free Felina and she promises him loyalty, her silence, and lots of money.
episodes.title: Despiertan al Diablo

episodes.synopsis: Dalvio and Víctor are involved in a shootout. Dalvio faces Aurelio and they threaten each other at gunpoint. Colón moves Esperanza to a safe house.
episodes.title: Lluvia de balas

episodes.synopsis: Mónica secretly listens to Víctor’s plans. Some news will change Eunice’s mind. Esperanza’s parents will pay to find her.
episodes.title: Plomo en casa de Rutila

episodes.synopsis: Rafael offers Mónica cocaine in exchange for information about Casillas and she sharpens her claws. Felina is extradited. Aurelio goes after Emiliana.
episodes.title: El soplón

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio looks for Emiliana and threatens to eat her alive. They investigate Rutila’s past. Castillo is close to finding out the truth.
episodes.title: Emiliana suplica por su vida

episodes.synopsis: After a moment of passion, Aurelio avenges Emiliana. The Salvatierras turn to the president, a man with a shady past.
episodes.title: El pasado de Terán

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio and his men prepare an attack against Víctor. The four tons of cocaine are being sent to their destination. Mónica rejects Omar.
episodes.title: Tambores de guerra

episodes.synopsis: The gunfight begins. Aurelio shoots Víctor and thinks that he killed him. Tony Pastrana is about to be released from prison.
episodes.title: Fuego cruzado

episodes.synopsis: Omar decides to hide information from the press. Rodrigo finds out that Sebastián is undercover. Colón tells Rodrigo to be careful, lest he be killed.
episodes.title: Desenmascarar al presidente

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio goes to Cuba and meets Penumbra but not everything goes according to plan. Víctor decides to work undercover until he is out of the spotlight.
episodes.title: Choque de titanes

episodes.synopsis: Mónica Robles swears that she will get revenge on Aurelio for taking away her child. The president loses his composure.
episodes.title: Más poder, segura venganza

episodes.synopsis: Casillas plans to hack into Rutila’s account and withdraw five million dollars. Mónica’s business with Doble 30 vanishes.
episodes.title: Robo cibernético

episodes.synopsis: Pastrana thinks about using Aurelio’s children as a strategy for getting revenge. Rutila says that money was stolen from her account.
episodes.title: El punto débil

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio confirms that he had a relationship with Feyo’s wife. Dalvio suggests not confronting the Maras and the Emes. Víctor wants Mónica back.
episodes.title: El imperio de Casillas

episodes.synopsis: Rutila blames her father for the stolen money. Pastrana locates one of Aurelio’s children. Mónica reprimands Víctor for human trafficking.
episodes.title: Un remolino de poder

episodes.synopsis: Tony Pastrana goes to Colombia to get revenge on Casillas. A frightened Arelis is questioned and ends up informing on Juan Carlos and Pina.
episodes.title: Plan sangriento

episodes.synopsis: Doble 30 offers Aurelio three tons of drugs and threatens to turn him into the authorities or to Víctor. Mónica asks them to let him go.
episodes.title: Casillas vs. Doble 30

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio Casillas is furious about his son’s death and thinks about the war that will break loose. Pastrana prepares an attack on him.
episodes.title: El escudo ante la guerra

episodes.synopsis: The opening of Víctor’s establishment soon becomes the scene of horror and panic. Juan Carlos tries to bribe a federal agent.
episodes.title: Siniestro en el antro

episodes.synopsis: Amidst the chaos, Sebastián helps Rutila. She needs a lawyer to help her submit her complaints to the president after a guard takes her phone.
episodes.title: Conexión presidencial

episodes.synopsis: Omar takes the bait that Rodrigo set for him and goes to Castillo looking for Rutila. The press is expecting him. He fires Rodrigo.
episodes.title: La jugada de Terán

episodes.synopsis: Víctor confesses that he can’t deal with so much hatred. Aurelio has a proposition for him. Rodrigo thinks about eliminating Paloma.
episodes.title: Los Casillas frente a frente

episodes.synopsis: Tony and Víctor set up a meeting. Aurelio threatens Mónica so that she cooperates to find Nazareno’s killer. Rodrigo asks for Evelyn to be released.
episodes.title: Cita sangrienta

episodes.synopsis: Mónica insults the president and throws him out of her house. Colón and Salazar find the “narco nephews” and prepare an attack on the Soles Cartel.
episodes.title: El plan inesperado

episodes.synopsis: Evelyn and Carla unite to expose Omar. Paloma senses a divorce. Pilar does business with the Arabs. Rutila demands an explanation from Pompeyo.
episodes.title: Infeliz encuentro

episodes.synopsis: Carla Uzcátegui gets ready to report the president’s connection with the drug traffickers. Aurelio receives some terrible news.
episodes.title: Escándalo a la vista

episodes.synopsis: The president plots Paloma’s murder and blackmails Jaime. Uzcátegui wants to prove the connection between Terán and the Robles. La Niña wants revenge.
episodes.title: El presidente, un sicario

episodes.synopsis: The President of Venezuela asks Aurelio to kill a witness so he doesn’t talk. Salazar starts an operation to attract Casillas.
episodes.title: Callar a un testigo

episodes.synopsis: Skinny does his first job with Aurelio. El Greñas confesses to Ismael. Without knowing it, Tata compromises everyone’s safety.
episodes.title: Más de una baja

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio makes it to the ranch and is furious when he finds Mónica with Isidrito. Ismael interrupts the tense situation.
episodes.title: Rodean a los Casillas

episodes.synopsis: The Navy and the DEA break into Casillas’s ranch. Aurelio, la Niña, Vitamina, Chatarrero, and Mónica hide. Dalvio hides a truck full of cocaine.
episodes.title: Drones, balas y allanamiento

episodes.synopsis: Ismael shows Aurelio a revealing photo. Casillas warns Juan Carlos that someone else besides his daughter will die. Alba distances herself.
episodes.title: Condenados a morir

episodes.synopsis: Omar has to recognize his connection with the Robles and announce that Casillas is still alive. Tony wants to get closer to Mónica.
episodes.title: Declara o destapan la olla

episodes.synopsis: Rivero blackmails the president and tells him he has compromising documents. Omar wants to erase the evidence from the call and contacts Casillas.
episodes.title: Rivero firma su sentencia

episodes.synopsis: The President asks for 48 hours to make a statement that will shake the country. Aurelio makes Pilar an offer but Eunice says that he is a womanizer.
episodes.title: Rutila en la mira

episodes.synopsis: Rutila accepts the fact that Sebastián has chosen his destiny. Rodrigo, Evelyn, and Érica are ready to record the president.
episodes.title: Enmudecen al informante

episodes.synopsis: Rivero transmits a TV message that traps the president. Aurelio has the solution and tells Terán to follow his instructions.
episodes.title: Contra la pared

episodes.synopsis: A gunfight erupts between the Rodrigo and Aurelio gangs. Rutila jumps in because she knows that Casillas wants Rodrigo dead.
episodes.title: Morir, antes que entregarse

episodes.synopsis: Omar says and does what el Señor orders. Rodrigo is accused of betrayal. Casillas wins under “the conspiracy”.
episodes.title: Al pie de la letra

episodes.synopsis: The military executes the search warrant while on the trail of the Rivero crime. Uzcátegui could be charged with interfering with justice.
episodes.title: ¿Traición a la patria?

episodes.synopsis: Pilar tells Aurelio the truth and goes to Mexico with him. Aurelio makes business plans with Ninón, who doesn’t hide her interest in him.
episodes.title: Pilar muere de celos

episodes.synopsis: Ninón flirts with Aurelio. Pilar protests and he proposes a trio. La Felina, her friend, tries to open her eyes.
episodes.title: Triángulo de amor

episodes.synopsis: Ninón can’t stand Pilar. Ahmed and his thugs carry out Madam’s wishes. Aurelio orders Vitaminas and Zopilote to find her.
episodes.title: Ninón "se encarga" de su rival

episodes.synopsis: Pilar is desperate, but Aurelio and la Felina look for her. Ninón tells her son the truth and shows him pictures of his father.
episodes.title: La estampida de Esperanza

episodes.synopsis: Tony and Mónica explain why they sell drugs. For her, true happiness doesn’t exist. A worried La Felina calls Pilar, but another person answers.
episodes.title: La frustración de Mónica

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza calls Aurelio and asks him to leave her be. He calls her a traitor for giving him to the DEA and swears revenge.
episodes.title: Casillas jura vengarse

episodes.synopsis: With the video of Rodrigo up his sleeve, Carla Uzcátegui wants to meet with Rutila and says what she wants to hear: she is an example.
episodes.title: Uzcátegui, en terreno movedizo

episodes.synopsis: Tony wants to eliminate Aurelio. Without knowing it, Mónica acts as a decoy. Leonardo insists on taking charge of Ninón’s business.
episodes.title: Una trampa para Aurelio

episodes.synopsis: La Felina threatens to murder Ninón for killing her friend Pilar. She demands a drug test. Aurelio is the mediator.
episodes.title: La Felina no come cuentos

episodes.synopsis: Rutila and Javi get closer than planned, but agree not to talk about Aurelio Casillas. Monica leaves Tony and Carmen kisses Ismael.
episodes.title: Peligrosa atracción

episodes.synopsis: Rutila agrees to an interview with Uzcátegui and promises to speak “about everything.” Rutila asks Pompeyo to erase all traces of his other romance.
episodes.title: De cara a la prensa

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio and Mónica have an honest, nostalgia-filled meeting. La Felina meets Leonardo, Ninón’s weak point. Ismael looks like his father.
episodes.title: Ex amantes que negocian

episodes.synopsis: In Spain, Aurelio is depressed after Pilar’s disappearance and swears he’ll get rid of Esperanza. Eunice promises revenge for Ninón.
episodes.title: Rastrean a Esperanza

episodes.synopsis: Javi brings Rutila the money that Aurelio stole and they have a tryst. He invites her to Colombia but she’s not looking for anything serious.
episodes.title: Más que un mensajero

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio tortures Jorge Elías Salazar to make him speak. A physician confirms that Paloma is healthy but she won’t accept it.
episodes.title: Torturan a Salazar

episodes.synopsis: Tony decides to protect Esperanza and makes her a partner. Rutila and Javier admit they’re in a relationship to Mónica but someone else finds out.
episodes.title: Alianza para matar

episodes.synopsis: Javi and Aurelio have a conversation that sets the family’s destiny. As a pair, Rutila and Javi could be the target of their enemies, or their allies.
episodes.title: De hombre a hombre

episodes.synopsis: Tony and Esperanza ensure that Mónica doesn’t reveal their plan against Aurelio. Salazar is saved. Ismael and Greñas unite to track the cocaine.
episodes.title: Testigo, pero no cómplice

episodes.synopsis: Leandro sees that if Aurelio remains a problem, he must be eliminated. Esperanza, Tony, and Mónica plan to compete in the market. Aurelio helps Tata.
episodes.title: Traición o negocios

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza tries to drown the guilt she feels about Zoe’s death in alcohol. She thinks that her life and Mónica’s are in Aurelio’s hands.
episodes.title: La depresión de Esperanza

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio, la Madame, Alí and their cronies, the Spanish Navy, the DEA, and Interpol descend upon Tenerife. All are tense, but Casillas orders retreat.
episodes.title: La retirada de Casillas

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio asks Ninón to pay the rent for the airplanes so he can get the cargo back. Omar won’t confirm whether Casillas is dead or alive.
episodes.title: Treinta toneladas lo valen

episodes.synopsis: Tony and Mónica do business with Doble 30 and to leave Ninón out, kidnapping her son. Alí has orders to carry out the attack.
episodes.title: El secuestro

episodes.synopsis: Ninón asks Aurelio for help finding her son who was kidnapped. The Spaniard plays dirty: he asks Penumbra to leave Casillas and become his partner.
episodes.title: Casillas al rescate

episodes.synopsis: At a press conference, Omar silences the rumors that el Señor de los Cielos is alive. Terán puts Casillas in charge of a mission against Paloma.
episodes.title: Sicariato

episodes.synopsis: Ninón goes to the site where her son is being held hostage and almost ruins the rescue operation. Paloma heads to Jaime’s house and asks him to flee.
episodes.title: El coraje de Ninón

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio attacks Filemón and Leonardo’s kidnappers in Marseilles. Colón and his team find out that the seized drugs are being stolen.
episodes.title: Casillas y sus dos batallas
