episodes.synopsis: Ismael, Raymundo, Chatarrero, and their henchmen find the drugs and distribute them, however, they leave a trail of blood in their wake.
episodes.title: Arrasan con todo

episodes.synopsis: Mónica convinces the president to grant Pastrana a hearing. Paloma’s life is hanging by a thread. Casillas and Ninón are together.
episodes.title: El poder del billete

episodes.synopsis: Ismael takes Leonardo to Rutila’s house to seek refuge, but he isn’t well received. Leonardo asks them to help him find el Chema so he can meet him.
episodes.title: En busca de El Chema

episodes.synopsis: Now that Casillas has touched Ninón’s heart, he wants to know if she is out to get Pilar. Rutila is against the search for el Chema.
episodes.title: Amante incrédulo

episodes.synopsis: Paloma has a heart attack and Omar thinks she’s dead. When she comes to, she asks why he tried to kill her when they could’ve just gotten a divorce.
episodes.title: Presidente sin escrúpulos

episodes.synopsis: Dalvio and his men find Esperanza, and Aurelio orders them to kill her. Gunfire erupts and casualties mount. Esperanza asks Tony for help.
episodes.title: El blanco es Esperanza

episodes.synopsis: Juan Carlos is met with a surprise at Aurelio’s house. Ismael finds out that Esperanza’s father managed to find them. La Felina gets the evidence.
episodes.title: ¿Infiltrados?

episodes.synopsis: Juan Carlos tells Aurelio how he found him and Casillas tries to determine whether he’s telling the truth. Ismael and Greñas slip past security.
episodes.title: Oídos sordos

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio makes a tally of all the deaths weighing on his conscience. Esperanza receives a disturbing message. Mónica fears retaliation from Aurelio.
episodes.title: La próxima víctima

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio makes a decision after the safe house is discovered. Mónica asks the president for help with her son.
episodes.title: Casillas se queda con Isidro

episodes.synopsis: Rutila asks Aurelio to take pity on Esperanza. Meanwhile, a compromising video of Terán is found. Eunice gets rid of Ahmed for killing Pilar.
episodes.title: Sin piedad

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio and his henchmen guard Tony and Esperanza, but she has a weapon and is ready to attack. The DEA operation draws near.
episodes.title: El momento de la verdad

episodes.synopsis: Salvatierra and Salazar come to rescue Esperanza in a helicopter but something goes wrong. Mónica swears she'll kill Ninón to get Isidro back.
episodes.title: Casillas gana otra vez

episodes.synopsis: Javier and Rutila find out the Colombians' plan. Quezada wants to team up with Tony. There is a reward for Aurelio's head.
episodes.title: Caen en la trampa

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio goes to Colombia to try to rescue Rutila. Tony makes it to Quezada's ranch and recognizes Javi. Casillas and his men cause casualties.
episodes.title: Al rescate de Rutila

episodes.synopsis: Pastrana is in Aurelio's hands after Eunice turned him in in exchange for Ninón. Bit by bit, death encroaches on everyone.
episodes.title: La sombra de la muerte

episodes.synopsis: El Cabo and his allies return to take over the business and get rid of Casillas and his family. El Señor de los Cielos disproves the president on TV.
episodes.title: A la caza de Aurelio Casillas

episodes.synopsis: On national TV, Aurelio Casillas challenges Colombia's drug traffickers and puts the president of Mexico between a rock and a hard place.
episodes.title: Casillas declara la guerra

episodes.synopsis: Corina promises Casillas that she didn't sell him out, but he doesn't believe her. Javi wakes up but has memory loss. Quezada prepares his revenge.
episodes.title: Casillas encierra a su amante

episodes.synopsis: It's time for revenge and Leandro has the chance to get rid of El Señor de los Cielos and his daughter. El Cabo demands a meeting with the president.
episodes.title: Atacan a Casillas y a Rutila por sorpresa

episodes.synopsis: Casillas flirts with Maldonado in the forest and El Cabo bribes the Mexican head of state. Ismael identifies the aggressor with the bazooka.
episodes.title: Casillas y El Cabo crean alianzas

episodes.synopsis: The drug pop-ups are low on supplies and Casillas doesn't know how to get more. El Cabo plans to take him out of the game.
episodes.title: El imperio Casillas se viene abajo

episodes.synopsis: The Mexican and Colombian narcos fight for territory and blood flows through the streets. Aurelio kills police officers and tells his family to run.
episodes.title: El Cabo se lo buscó y Casillas reparte plomo

episodes.synopsis: Casillas receives the information that Corina had promised. El Cabo denies an alliance with Quezada. Rutila blackmails the president.
episodes.title: Corina prueba su lealtad a Casillas

episodes.synopsis: Casillas and his men kidnap Castillo but will free him under one condition. Zuleta manages to convince Terán to agree to meet with El Cabo.
episodes.title: La cena está servida para Casillas

episodes.synopsis: El Cabo and the president close a macabre deal. Zuleta lies and is put in the spotlight. Maldonado gives drugs and gold to El Señor de los Cielos.
episodes.title: Todos los poderes en contra de Casillas

episodes.synopsis: Casillas and Ámbar Maldonado go to Turkey on business and work their powers of seduction. Quezada prepares an ambush at one of El Cabo's labs.
episodes.title: Casillas emprende una nueva conquista

episodes.synopsis: Leandro Quezada and his men kill El Cabo's lieutenants in cold blood and take charge of one of his labs. Casillas and Ámbar travel to Turkey.
episodes.title: Quezada destrona a El Cabo

episodes.synopsis: Casillas and Maldonado flee with the truck of gold from the Venezuelan reserves. El Cabo decides not to attack Quezada, for now. Milena lies to Rutila.
episodes.title: Ámbar arrastra a Casillas al infierno turco

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio threatens to send Ámbar to her grave if she betrays him. Rutila's mission is to locate Quezada and loosen tongues with tequila.
episodes.title: Ámbar conoce el lado siniestro de Casillas

episodes.synopsis: Casillas doesn't believe one of Ámbar's excuses. The operation to find Quezada begins. El Cabo is happy with Zuleta's tunnel.
episodes.title: La huida misteriosa de Ámbar molesta a Aurelio

episodes.synopsis: Casillas threatens to throw Ámbar out of the plane but she has brought something that could save her life. Rutila finds a clue in the crashed plane.
episodes.title: Ámbar sorprende a Casillas con un detonador nuclear

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio and Ámbar are one of a kind: they do business for the adrenaline and the joy that they derive from it, not the money.
episodes.title: Casillas y Maldonado se mueven por placer

episodes.synopsis: Quezada demands El Cabo's complicity and silence in order to trick Casillas. Navarro still doesn't trust Corina's loyalty. Rutila asks for help.
episodes.title: La extraña muerte de Quezada acorrala a Casillas

episodes.synopsis: In Colombia, Aurelio pushes the guerrillas to tell him the truth after Corina tells him that Quezada's death might have been faked.
episodes.title: Sueltan la sopa o Casillas mata a los rebeldes

episodes.synopsis: Castillo continues with the plan to end drug trafficking. Ámbar gives the detonator to the terrorists, although she vows to never do it again.
episodes.title: La DEA está tras la pista de El Cabo

episodes.synopsis: El Señor de los Cielos demands to see the person who pulls the strings at La Habana to clarify some production issues and the business hierarchy.
episodes.title: Casillas llega a La Habana a enfrentar a Raúl Castro

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio challenges Valdés to take a stance but the second-in-command of the Cuban Revolution remains silent. Rutila suggests a change.
episodes.title: Casillas provoca a el diablo en Cuba

episodes.synopsis: Milton Jiménez is astounded by the beauty of Pastor Felipe's fiancée. Casillas flees Cuba and Ámbar is arrested for letting him escape.
episodes.title: El Cabo se enamora a primera vista

episodes.synopsis: Casillas finds out who is behind the attacks on the Veracruz family. Rutila tries to go into business with her father. Javi lies to Garañón.
episodes.title: Casillas descubre las maniobras de El Cabo

episodes.synopsis: El Cabo kills the Pastor so he can have Evelina. Castillo keeps his eye on Zuleta. Javi visits Kashi and Milena suggests a threesome.
episodes.title: Rutila se entera que Súper Javi está vivo

episodes.synopsis: Rutila gets good news and goes to Colombia. El Cabo consoles Evelina. The city's downtown is like a powder keg.
episodes.title: Rutila se reencuentra con Javi

episodes.synopsis: Casillas discovers that the president is protecting El Cabo while the Colombian executes his men and steals territory from the Señor de los Cielos.
episodes.title: El Cabo se apodera de Ciudad de México

episodes.synopsis: Javi and Rutila make it to the Coltán mines. Zuleta and Omar plot against Castillo. The Casillas family asks Tito Linares to support them.
episodes.title: Rutila seduce a Súper Javi

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio kidnaps Uzcátegui, and demands that she get him meetings with the presidential candidates. El Cabo promises to be a serious entrepreneur.
episodes.title: Casillas mueve su ficha del cuarto poder

episodes.synopsis: The President of Mexico threatens El Cabo. Aurelio can't imagine what is in store for him when he runs into Diana. Corina is furious with Colón.
episodes.title: El Cabo es mejor amigo que enemigo

episodes.synopsis: Casillas gives Valdés a "tip" to compensate for the casualties caused on the island. Diana lies to El Chivo.
episodes.title: Casillas se burla de la Revolución cubana

episodes.synopsis: Castillo investigates Gilberto's death and meets Diana, but something doesn't smell right to him. The Venezuelan embassy in Mexico welcomes Valdés.
episodes.title: Súper Javi y Rutila se exponen a la guerrilla

episodes.synopsis: Capable of installing and removing presidents at will, Casillas kidnaps Begoña, placing her plans in doubt. Diana wants to leave the drug trade.
episodes.title: Casillas evalúa a los presidenciables

episodes.synopsis: Casillas poses the legal trade in drugs to candidate Begoña Morejón. Diana Ahumada is unaware of her wealth.
episodes.title: Casillas ve una salida en legalizar las drogas

episodes.synopsis: Corina warns Casillas that his extradition is approved, so he forces Ámbar to go with the DEA and follow his instructions. El Chivo suspects nothing.
episodes.title: Casillas exige a Ámbar que se entregue a la DEA

episodes.synopsis: Rutila reveals something about her past before Javier has time to discover it. Casillas tries to meet the other candidate, Gómez Labrador.
episodes.title: Rutila enfurece con Súper Javi

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio imprisons Gómez Labrador and demands that he confess everything about the amnesty. He refuses to negotiate.
episodes.title: Casillas rapta al candidato Gómez Labrador

episodes.synopsis: After the crime involving the two DEA agents, Casillas wants Corina to leave the agency and come save the world with him.
episodes.title: Casillas manda y las mujeres obedecen

episodes.synopsis: Corina gives Ámbar instructions on what to do to distract the DEA. Diana discovers who her partner is. Zuleta executes one of Casillas' men.
episodes.title: Ámbar y Corina se enfrentan como leonas en celo

episodes.synopsis: Diana Ahumada wants to stop being a drug trafficker but El Cabo forces her to continue. Javier remembers how he met Rutila.
episodes.title: Estalla la guerra entre El Cabo y Diana Ahumada

episodes.synopsis: Diana Ahumada asks Ricario to improve her family's security. Alba reveals information about Aurelio. Arelys has to comply with an order.
episodes.title: Diana desafía a El Cabo

episodes.synopsis: Armed to the hilt, Diana aims at El Cabo when he arrives with his men. Arelys tells her boss the whole truth.
episodes.title: Diana tiene a El Cabo en la mira

episodes.synopsis: The DEA demands the handover of five drug traffickers from the government. Ámbar will give up a bigwig but asks for American citizenship in return.
episodes.title: Ámbar activa el plan y negocia con la DEA

episodes.synopsis: Milton Jiménez goes to Monclova to scare Diana, he threatens her family and leaves a clear message: next time, he'll kill her.
episodes.title: El Cabo se desquita con Diana

episodes.synopsis: Casillas threatens to kill the president. A senator's death is linked to Águila Azul. Aurelio discovers that Carla recorded him.
episodes.title: La DEA va detrás de Casillas y de Águila Azul

episodes.synopsis: Ismael carries out a kidnapping. Nora Requena agrees to extradite Aurelio. Diana insists her family move to Spain.
episodes.title: El Rojo se une a Casillas

episodes.synopsis: El Cabo learns of Casillas' location; he goes after him and his family and tries to rescue Evelina and Mocho. A stranger executes a former CIA agent.
episodes.title: Casillas le pone el ojo a la mujer de El Cabo

episodes.synopsis: El Cabo prepares to settle an old score he has with Casillas. El Greñas uncovers Evelina's shady past. Corina is desperate to track down Águila Azul.
episodes.title: El Cabo está listo para aniquilar a Casillas

episodes.synopsis: Diana Ahumada tells her mother the truth about the family business. Casillas has Zuleta investigated. Maldonado manipulates Navarro but he finds out.
episodes.title: Diana confiesa a su familia que es narcotraficante

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio maintains that an attack is the best defense and tries to find out Los Pinos's plans. The presidential reception is sabotaged.
episodes.title: Casillas decide acabar con el presidente

episodes.synopsis: Casillas shoots Zuleta and gives the president a warning. Ismael tortures Mocho but Rutila stops him. El Cabo gets hold of Evelina's criminal record.
episodes.title: Casillas mata en las narices del presidente

episodes.synopsis: Milton Jiménez swears that he'll make Casillas take a dose of his own medicine. Evelina and Mocho escape. Diana recruits gang members.
episodes.title: Casillas y El Cabo se baten a duelo

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio thinks he killed El Cabo but someone shoots him. El Señor de los Cielos asks an old friend for help. Alba and her group find refuge.
episodes.title: El Cabo le da un balazo en la cabeza a Casillas

episodes.synopsis: Seriously injured, Casillas stays with El Rayo, an old childhood friend, who tries to keep him alive. El Cabo looks for Aurelio to finish him off.
episodes.title: Casillas lucha entre la vida y la muerte

episodes.synopsis: Águila Azul kills a former agent and finds out that Colón is in cahoots with his enemies. El Rayo could turn Casillas in and never work again.
episodes.title: Águila Azul revela su identidad y mata otra vez

episodes.synopsis: Everyone is after Casillas, but the president and El Cabo want him dead while the DEA needs him alive to extradite him to the US.
episodes.title: Intensifican la búsqueda detrás de Casillas

episodes.synopsis: Corina finds out that Amado Leal is accused of drug trafficking. Garañón and El Cabo form an alliance. A memory becomes a clue.
episodes.title: Águila Azul y Corina van al refugio de Casillas

episodes.synopsis: Águila Azul reveals his brother's identity. El Cabo reviews the list of boxing gyms in Tepito. Navarro questions Maldonado.
episodes.title: Corina oye que Aurelio y Amado son hermanos

episodes.synopsis: Milton Jiménez and his men destroy Casillas' hideout but end up facing someone they do not recognize. Aurelio's condition worsens.
episodes.title: El Cabo enfrenta a Águila Azul

episodes.synopsis: While Diana confesses to her sister that she never went to Spain, several men hold her at gunpoint. El Cabo loses Casillas's trail in Tepito.
episodes.title: Secuestran a Diana Ahumada

episodes.synopsis: Evelina suspects that Milton Jiménez was involved in the gym attack and warns him that his father could be killed. Aurelio is taken to Ahumada Ranch.
episodes.title: Evelina sospecha que El Cabo mató a su padre

episodes.synopsis: Amado and Ismael decide to move Casillas so he can receive medical attention and keep his identity a secret. Alba rejects Águila Azul.
episodes.title: Salvar a Casillas es una misión contra reloj

episodes.synopsis: Diana defends herself from one of the Ramos brothers. Meanwhile, Águila Azul prepares a rescue mission. El Cabo changes his plans.
episodes.title: Diana pelea a golpes con su secuestrador

episodes.synopsis: A surprise attack on the Ramos brothers' ranch, led by Águila Azul, ends with several casualties. Amado ambushes El Cabo. Aurelio is operated on.
episodes.title: Águila Azul rescata a Diana Ahumada

episodes.synopsis: Diana makes a confession to Águila Azul. El Cabo has got El Chivo in his sights. Casillas is still in intensive care.
episodes.title: A Diana le atrae Águila Azul

episodes.synopsis: When Diana's father announces that he is withdrawing his candidacy, El Cabo and his men shoot to kill. Diana wants to hire Amado to eliminate Milton.
episodes.title: El Cabo provoca un atentado contra El Chivo

episodes.synopsis: On board a plane loaded with cocaine, Javi is being chased and has to land but comes up with a way to communicate his whereabouts to Rutila.
episodes.title: Atrapan a Javi

episodes.synopsis: Rutila gathers her men and introduces Amado as a Casillas. At the head of the operation, she gives her first order. Colón knows about the capture.
episodes.title: Amado Casillas vs El Cabo

episodes.synopsis: Diana receives a threatening call from El Cabo. Jaime tries to free Javi, but the DEA prevents it. Terán is thrown out of Rancho Ahumada.
episodes.title: Diana y El Cabo se amenazan de muerte

episodes.synopsis: Omar Terán uses the media to paint himself as a victim, defame the former Secretary of Security and blame Aurelio Casillas for a murder.
episodes.title: El presidente denuncia que Casillas mató al Chivo

episodes.synopsis: Amado Leal makes a confession. Alba and the Casillas family have to leave the Ahumada Ranch. Amado suggests launching an attack during the elections.
episodes.title: Diana y Amado se besan por primera vez

episodes.synopsis: Amado pretends to be Aurelio in a commando mission, confronts the DEA and manages to free some men. Diana has to turn herself in to the authorities.
episodes.title: Amado saca de prisión a Javi y al Rojo

episodes.synopsis: Ismael Casillas promises a generous reward to the ambassador of Venezuela in exchange for information. Amado goes after the seized merchandise.
episodes.title: Sospechan que Ámbar es la traidora

episodes.synopsis: Amado makes Diana a promise, but first he must go to Tijuana to help the Casillas move. Ismael asks an abused and hurt Laura for a photo of her ex.
episodes.title: Diana y Amado viven una noche de pasión

episodes.synopsis: Esther swears that when she is governor she'll arrest her own daughter. Amado will do everything in his power to hide Aurelio's grave condition.
episodes.title: Amenazan con detener a Diana

episodes.synopsis: The Casillas family have El Cabo in their sights in Quintana Roo. The DEA discusses a reward for Aurelio and Milton Jiménez.
episodes.title: Diana destapa su botín millonario

episodes.synopsis: The DEA offers 10 million dollars for Aurelio and El Cabo. Ismael will give three times that amount to guarantee loyalty to the Señor de los Cielos.
episodes.title: Ofrecen recompensa por Casillas y El Cabo

episodes.synopsis: Leonardo reappears at the Playa del Carmen and admits that he fled Sinaloa where he was living with his father. Amado negotiates with Maldonado.
episodes.title: El hijo mayor de El Chema sorprende a los Casillas

episodes.synopsis: El Cabo and the Casillas family are in a shoot-out. El Chema goes after his son, Leonardo. Mayra's remains are taken away from Los Pinos.
episodes.title: Amado le tiende una emboscada al Cabo

episodes.synopsis: The Casillas family gets ready to take on El Chema. El Rojo must decide which side he's on. José María Venegas doubles the reward for Aurelio's head.
episodes.title: El Rojo debe decidir entre Casillas y El Chema

episodes.synopsis: Even though it is recommended that El Chema keep a low profile, he decides to look for Leonardo. Amado puts off dealing with El Cabo.
episodes.title: El Chema va por su hijo al Distrito Federal

episodes.synopsis: The house in Tijuana is best for hiding Aurelio. Amado orders Diana to facilitate the Casillas' move. Evelina threatens to leave El Cabo.
episodes.title: Amado consigue un nuevo escondite para Aurelio

episodes.synopsis: To locate Casillas, El Chema approaches Corina, because she is a DEA agent, but she is reluctant to help him. Terán and Navarro confront each other.
episodes.title: El Chema se lleva a Corina a la fuerza

episodes.synopsis: The Casillas are already installed in Tijuana. Diana and Amado's love promises to be long-lasting. El Chema considers an alliance with Aurelio.
episodes.title: Diana y Amado viven un reencuentro apasionado

episodes.synopsis: While Amado prepares to stop the terrorist attack on the United States, Aurelio moves unexpectedly when he recognizes Corina's voice. Casasola lies.
episodes.title: Aurelio reacciona del coma

episodes.synopsis: The Arabs eliminate the Casillas' spy but Amado deciphers the killer's message. Carla Uzcátegui denounces Terán in front of the whole cabinet.
episodes.title: Amado tiene pistas del atentado a EE.UU

episodes.synopsis: Terán flees Los Pinos. El Colombiano looks for him on his private jet, and demands his gunmen be allowed aboard. Corina and Casasola become allies.
episodes.title: El Cabo condiciona su ayuda al presidente

episodes.synopsis: The Casillas go to Casasola and Ámbar's rescue and surprise the Arabs, achieving the unthinkable. El Chema takes charge of the narcotienditas.
episodes.title: Amado impide el ataque terrorista a EE.UU

episodes.synopsis: La Doña arrives in Mexico and joins Amado to take on Baltazar Ojeda, putting the Casillas at risk. El Chema is bent on discovering Aurelio's double.
episodes.title: La Doña y Amado se unen contra el enemigo

episodes.synopsis: Amado decides to go out with La Doña and Diana, but she warns him she's not his wife. Altagracia manipulates Águila Azul. Anaya commits another crime.
episodes.title: Diana muere de celos con La Doña

episodes.synopsis: Altagracia seduces Amado during the operative to hunt and kill their common enemy. Uzcátegui reports a femicide. El Chema goes after the journalist.
episodes.title: La Doña besa a Amado como en el pasado

episodes.synopsis: After two ambushes, explosions, and shootings, Amado confronts Baltazar Ojeda. Anaya is kidnapped. El Pulque makes a confession.
episodes.title: Amado y Ojeda se baten a duelo

episodes.synopsis: After so many years, El Chema re-encounters Rutila. Diana awaits the Colombian attack, and Amado decides to assist her in the operation.
episodes.title: El Chema sigue enamorado de Rutila

episodes.synopsis: Amado and Diana defend Ahumada Ranch. Rutila has to make a decision, but first she consults the rest of the family. La Doña asks Corina for help.
episodes.title: Diana y Amado contratacan a los colombianos

episodes.synopsis: La Doña has a plan to launder the Casillas' fortune. Carla brings the file against Terán to light and he orders her death.
episodes.title: La Doña cierra un trato con los Casillas

episodes.synopsis: Chema allies with the Casillas to annihilate El Cabo. Rutila fights Javi when she finds out that he was with his ex. Amado obliterates the Colombians.
episodes.title: Javi y los Casillas molestos con Rutila

episodes.synopsis: The Casillas family makes a pact with El Chema so they can declare war on their common enemy. Terán sets off but Jaime steps in to help the president.
episodes.title: El Cabo debe salir de México vivo o muerto

episodes.synopsis: Castillo puts Terán behind bars and swears he will pay for his crimes. El Cabo gets his women pregnant but they both refuse to have the babies.
episodes.title: Castillo arresta al presidente Terán

episodes.synopsis: In order to protect the Casillas cartel, Amado turns himself in to the law and Diana promises to get him out of prison.
episodes.title: Amado se entrega a las autoridades

episodes.synopsis: Doña Alba tries to revive Aurelio; the Casillas family takes over the city to try to free Amado, uniting with enemies and confronting the government.
episodes.title: Nace una leyenda

episodes.synopsis: The government has the Casillas clan trapped, but they want to prove their toughness and don't give up easily. Pío plots his revenge on Javi.
episodes.title: Amor y guerra

episodes.synopsis: Amado's rescue fails; the US government transfers him. The Casillas family goes on the attack with a risky operation. Javi receives unexpected news.
episodes.title: La Liberación

episodes.synopsis: Pío José Valdivia, the Casillas' most dangerous enemy, begins to take his revenge, eliminating them one by one, with Superjavi first on his list.
episodes.title: La sombra del pasado

episodes.synopsis: Amado and Diana arrive in Greece in search of new allies to strengthen the Casillas cartel. But the Balkan mafia has other intentions.
episodes.title: Negocios en Grecia

episodes.synopsis: Amado wants to meet with Renzo Volpi to do business, and is surprised when the Balkan leader makes a request that puts him in a tough spot.
episodes.title: El Cartel de los Balcanes

episodes.synopsis: Doña Alba wants to bury Aurelio with her brother, but her grandchildren have other plans that enrage her. Esther declares war on her daughter Diana.
episodes.title: Los Casillas de luto

episodes.synopsis: The Casillas family say their final goodbyes to Aurelio, who has become a legend. His death makes the cartel stronger. Amado and Diana break up.
episodes.title: Nace el Cartel Casillas

episodes.synopsis: The Casillas family sends a shocking message to the world on network TV. Now their enemies plan an attack to wipe out everyone in the new cartel.
episodes.title: La noticia bomba

episodes.synopsis: Amado will use the loot they found to free Athina and her family from their debts with Volpi. The gangster gives an ultimatum.
episodes.title: Un tesoro en el fondo del mar

episodes.synopsis: Amado and Volpi can’t reach an agreement, and a new war breaks out. The attacks start immediately, and one Casillas is in the enemy's sights.
episodes.title: Desacuerdo peligroso

episodes.synopsis: Amado sees that Luz Marina is in danger and warns the Casillas family, who offer her protection. El Chema is ready to kill Navarro.
episodes.title: Los Casillas en alerta

episodes.synopsis: El Chema wants to kill Agent Navarro however possible. He uses Ámbar as bait and attacks mercilessly, at any price. Amado wants to kill Volpi.
episodes.title: El Chema contra la DEA

episodes.synopsis: Dylan is after El Chema. The Casillas family tries to warn him, but Pío has already targeted him. Amado recalls his time in the war with Volpi.
episodes.title: Un regalo mortífero

episodes.synopsis: Volpi pressures Amado to smuggle fentanyl with his worst enemy, Ojeda. Athina and Nikos celebrate their daughter's wedding, and an enemy appears.
episodes.title: Un mensaje de los Balcanes

episodes.synopsis: Worried for his niece’s life, Amado must accept the cold and brutal Renzo Volpi's conditions. Ismael and Rutila argue.
episodes.title: Ojo por ojo

episodes.synopsis: Rutila decides to go behind her family’s back to rescue her sister, Luzma. But an obstacle arises on her way to Switzerland.
episodes.title: Hija de tigre pintito

episodes.synopsis: The Casillas cartel strikes back, Aurelio-style. Pío and Ojeda pay the price. Ámbar conspires against the Cuban and Venezuelan governments.
episodes.title: Los Casillas no perdonan

episodes.synopsis: Renzo and Amado declare war. The Balkan leader orders Ojeda to bring in Diana Ahumada as part of his plan. Pío tries to escape from the authorities.
episodes.title: La caricia de la serpiente

episodes.synopsis: Volpi arrives in Mexico ready to take control of the Casillas’ territory. His strategy is to team up with another cartel. Diana confronts her mother.
episodes.title: Los Balcanes en México

episodes.synopsis: El Chema arrives at the meeting with the Chinese cartel and runs into the Casillas' greatest enemy, who seeks an alliance to get rid of them.
episodes.title: Peligrosa alianza

episodes.synopsis: Rutila discovers that El Cabo is still alive after his run-in with the Casillas family and plans to kill him for good. Volpi moves in on his target.
episodes.title: Caen las máscaras

episodes.synopsis: Amado confronts El Chema when he learns that he’s negotiating with his biggest enemy. A violent clash breaks out between the two cartels.
episodes.title: El Chema vs. Amado

episodes.synopsis: To get back the 300 kilos of cocaine Diana stole, Pío orders her mother and sister to be kidnapped. But he's in for the surprise of his life.
episodes.title: Con el diablo no se juega

episodes.synopsis: The Casillas family celebrate Doña Alba and Pulque's marriage, but not everything is joyful after they hear alarming news on the TV.
episodes.title: El arte de la guerra

episodes.synopsis: In Colombia, El Chema takes risks in order to land a large amount of drugs. Navarro finds the boss and plans to capture him. Amado has a bad feeling.
episodes.title: La DEA detrás de El Chema

episodes.synopsis: Governor Ahumada publicly accuses Pío José of being El Cabo, and he wants to get rid of her. The Colombian's enemies arrive and a shootout breaks out.
episodes.title: Provocación directa

episodes.synopsis: Diana tells her sister that she’ll be with her mother soon. Castillo intercepts the call and plans to capture the Casillas clan and save the governor.
episodes.title: Con el enemigo en la mira

episodes.synopsis: The Casillas work with the DEA to turn over the governor. Pío ensures that Jaime turns her over with ease. Navarro negotiates with Ámbar and Edith.
episodes.title: La venganza de Pío Valdivia

episodes.synopsis: The governor thinks she's safe, but Jaime warns Pío the Colombians are going to Coahuila and he helps with his revenge. El Chema gets bad news.
episodes.title: Cara a cara

episodes.synopsis: Messing with El Cabo has its price. The governor isn’t afraid of the Colombian and hits him hard where it really hurts. The Casillas look for Esther.
episodes.title: La muerte acecha

episodes.synopsis: Diana is furious to learn that her mother was executed. Amado asks her to keep a cool head, but she only wants justice.
episodes.title: La Furia de Diana

episodes.synopsis: Pío explodes with fury when Volpi freezes their business deals. In return, the Colombian narco attacks his enemies again to get what belongs to him.
episodes.title: El indetenible Pío

episodes.synopsis: Uzcátegui is impressed with the video El Cabo sent for her news broadcast, but she then takes a risk and sends him a message. El Chema fails Volpi.
episodes.title: Nuevas reglas del juego

episodes.synopsis: Ámbar wants to hand over El Chema and shares her plan with Navarro. The agent has no choice but to trust her and sets up an operation to capture him.
episodes.title: Empieza la cacería del Chema

episodes.synopsis: El Chema and his men realize that the government has them surrounded and devise an escape plan. But Navarro and Castillo won’t allow them to flee.
episodes.title: Venegas acorralado

episodes.synopsis: The authorities play their last card to capture El Chema, who always manages to escape. But Corina doesn’t give up and continues the hunt.
episodes.title: Unos ganan y otros pierden

episodes.synopsis: Castillo and Navarro move up El Chema's extradition. Things get complicated for the agents when someone disrupts the move. Diana tries to charm Volpi.
episodes.title: Una enemiga poderosa

episodes.synopsis: Diana is cornered by the family and has to explain that she was with Renzo Volpi. Amado explodes and makes it clear how things will be from then on.
episodes.title: Rebelión en familia

episodes.synopsis: The Casillas confirm that Volpi's house is a fentanyl laboratory and plan to destroy it in the same way the legendary "Lord of the Skies" did.
episodes.title: La revancha

episodes.synopsis: Navarro wants Edith's house watched to see if Ámbar is hiding there. He finds Istúriz, her right-hand person, and immediately orders a search warrant.
episodes.title: Una pista de La Coronela

episodes.synopsis: The Casillas have Pío's lawyer and want details about the Colombian. Amado teaches Diana a lesson to establish his power. El Cabo vows to kill Ismael.
episodes.title: Una fuerte lección

episodes.synopsis: Diana calls Volpi to meet up, not knowing that Athina is listening in. Athina sees a chance to avenge her family and decides to follow her.
episodes.title: La ocasión perfecta

episodes.synopsis: The Casillas attack the restaurant where Diana and Renzo Volpi are. A battle between the cartels leaves several dead. Colón discovers Dalila’s secret.
episodes.title: Masacre en La Condesa

episodes.synopsis: After the fall of the Balkans’ leader, Pío is dying to take over the business. But Ojeda won't make it easy. The Casillas suffer for one of their own.
episodes.title: Rey muerto, rey puesto

episodes.synopsis: Once they get Volpi out of the way, the Casillas plot their next move, to attack El Cabo and Ojeda. Fate unites them and is about to surprise them.
episodes.title: Los siguientes en la lista

episodes.synopsis: Dylan strives to keep the Casillas family from seeing the Colombian; a massacre occurs at the bar. Something happens that has everyone on alert.
episodes.title: Fiesta de narcos

episodes.synopsis: El Chema fears extradition to the U.S. and has no choice but to put his fate in the hands of the Casillas family. Navarro gets his own way.
episodes.title: Muerte o cárcel

episodes.synopsis: At a press conference, Navarro reports on El Chema's extradition to the U.S.; the Casillas family makes a final decision on the rescue.
episodes.title: Lucha contra el narco

episodes.synopsis: Diana and Vitamina are cornered at the Toluca airport, and a fight breaks out between Alfaro and his men. Ámbar plays a dirty trick on Valdés.
episodes.title: Los tiene bien puestos

episodes.synopsis: The Casillas attack the convoy, but Castillo orders the transfer to continue. Amado stops Alfaro and demands that he release Diana or pay the price.
episodes.title: Con los Casillas nadie se mete

episodes.synopsis: Joaquin escapes from El Cabo's men and lays an ambush. The Colombian finds out and orders his capture. Ámbar negotiates with the Casillas family.
episodes.title: Vivo o muerto

episodes.synopsis: Evelina arrives at the mall to meet Joaquín. The Casillas family is confronted by El Cabo’s cartel, and she tries to save his life.
episodes.title: La suerte de Evelina

episodes.synopsis: Pío Valdivia is devastated by his wife’s death and knows the lawyer is to blame. Joaquín fears that he will be killed and plans to flee the country.
episodes.title: Terror y melancolía

episodes.synopsis: The Casillas clan knows that to reach El Cabo directly, they must first eliminate Valdés. With Maldonado's help, they plan to lure him into a trap.
episodes.title: Los Casillas al asecho

episodes.synopsis: Amado proposes an alliance with Navarro to no avail. The agent threatens him with a weapon and clarifies that he is the one in charge.
episodes.title: Amenazas y alianzas

episodes.synopsis: Ojeda lets his madness run wild, and Alejandra pays the price. Dalila is afraid and wants to drop her off elsewhere to avoid responsibility.
episodes.title: Demencia

episodes.synopsis: Superjavi and Angela go to the hospital. The doctor says that Alejandra was beaten and raped. They trace her steps to find her assailant.
episodes.title: Víctima de abuso

episodes.synopsis: The Casillas family plans an attack on Ojeda. Amado orders a tail on Dalila and when she notices and tries to escape, Skinny corners her.
episodes.title: Dalila en la mira

episodes.synopsis: The Casillas family wants to spread the news that Ismael has taken over the cartel. Through Dalila, they send a tempting message to Ojeda.
episodes.title: Prueba de fuego

episodes.synopsis: To ensure that Dalila doesn't betray them, Corina and Colón make an unsettling deal with Amado. When he tells Diana about the plan, it gets worse.
episodes.title: Plan estratégico

episodes.synopsis: Diana can't help being jealous and argues with Amado. He wants to know if their relationship is strong enough to withstand what's coming with Dalila.
episodes.title: Amor a prueba

episodes.synopsis: Behind his partner's back, Ojeda meets Ismael and Superjavi to talk. They assure him they have nothing to do with Amado and make him a tempting offer.
episodes.title: Junta de enemigos

episodes.synopsis: Pío is irate when he sees how many drugs the Casillas clan stole from him. When he finds out Ojeda is negotiating with them, he changes plans.
episodes.title: Tracción entre socios

episodes.synopsis: The Casillas family attacks Pío when he arrives to get the drugs from Valdés. Pío confronts his enemies with gunshots, but he ends up cornered.
episodes.title: Lluvia de fuego

episodes.synopsis: With no way out, Pío Valdivia opts to surrender to prevent the Casillas clan from killing him. Amado tells Castillo that the Colombian is in custody.
episodes.title: Nadie perdona a nadie

episodes.synopsis: Greñas gets Luzma to go with him to meet Daryl, his online friend. Pío waits for the right moment to deliver a blow and get revenge on the Casillas.
episodes.title: Contraataque mortal

episodes.synopsis: Pío sends a strong message to the Casillas family. Everyone panics, trying to get out alive. Amado's men take over the hospital, expecting the worst.
episodes.title: Sin piedad

episodes.synopsis: Luzma is in critical condition after two respiratory arrests and two heart attacks. The Casillas' hopes are dashed; they make a very risky decision.
episodes.title: La dura verdad

episodes.synopsis: Amado wants allies to kill El Cabo. The Casillas make it clear that no one will touch any of them. Castillo is surprised by a nighttime visit.
episodes.title: Las estrategia de los Casillas

episodes.synopsis: Amado orders a huge attack with explosives, grenades and anything else needed. He also asks Dalila to give him information on Ojeda's laboratories.
episodes.title: Al ataque

episodes.synopsis: The Casillas have Ojeda's laboratory surrounded, and Amado tells Dalila to leave. Ojeda distrusts her and watches her closely.
episodes.title: Cinco minutos para salir

episodes.synopsis: Bullets rain down on Ojeda's laboratory. The narco knows there is no escape and wants to get rid of Dalila. Pio can’t send reinforcements to Ojeda.
episodes.title: Acorralado

episodes.synopsis: The Colombians revel in their revenge and find Alba, the Casillas' grandma. Rutila calls to warn her, but it’s too late to escape from Pío and Ojeda.
episodes.title: El dolor de los Casillas

episodes.synopsis: Ojeda and Pío want to settle accounts with their enemies and have a way to eliminate the Casillas. Amado must react quickly to avoid ruin.
episodes.title: Ver la muerte

episodes.synopsis: The actors who bring the formidable Casillas family to life reveal what goes on behind the scenes: anecdotes, challenging scenes and romances.
episodes.title: El señor de los cielos, la gran noche
